thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rim par phye ba yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la gsol

ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis

gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas de ma thag pa kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi rim par phye ba bka' stsal pa/ shes rab ye

shes rdo rje che/ /snying gar yongs su bsgoms nas su/ /ral gri sngon po phyag na bsnams/ /dbang chen dang ni me las 'khrungs/ /ye shes chen po gzi brjid che/ /'khrul ba med cing yi ge bral/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag shes

rab mchog /nyon mongs thams cad zad par byed/ /rdo rje kun bdag bkod pa po/ /kun du 'gro ba'i dam pa'i don/ /dbyer med mchog tu gsang ba po/ /rig pa mchog gi bdag nyid 'di/ /zhal drug pa la phyag drug mchog /

mngon shes drug ldan yi ge drug /rjes dran drug gi sbyor ba yis/ /phyag drug dam pa stobs po che/ /gzi brjid yang na stobs kyis kyang / /kun nas yongs su gsal ba po/ /gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste/ /nam mkha'i

khrums na rnam par gnas/ /yang na phyag gnyis shes par bya/ /ting nge 'dzin gnas sdig pa bcom/ /dpa' bo pad ma la gnas pa/ /zla ba'i mdog can 'od po che/ /rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes phra/ /shes rab pha rol

phyin pa 'bar/ /gdod nas ma skyes pa zhes bsam/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog /'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags/ /de'i sngags ni oM bA kye da~M na maH gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsang / /gsang

chen gyi ni dam par bzhed/ /rnam thar gsum gyi sgo la gnas/ /pha rol phyin drug rab tu gsal/ /rang nyid shes rab yin no zhes/ /sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /dbang po drug ni rab bsgyur te/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni rnal

'byor las/ /pad ma rA ga lta bu'i mdog /ston zla lta bur cher gsal ba/ /sems dpa' chen po gser gyi mdog /stobs po che ni bsgom par bya/ /'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni/ /shes rab dri ma med par 'gyur/ /

bstan bcos thams cad rab smra zhing / /dbang phyug thams cad mdun na gnas/ /kun gyi rgyal po sngags pa nyid/ /rang nyid kun gyi rgyal po mtshungs/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang / /byang chub kun gyi pha rol son/ /dbang

phyug kun dang bde ba che/ /chos rnams kun gyi yon tan mchog /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang / /yang na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /kun tu 'gro ba thob 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /dngul chu bcud

len de nyid dang / /rkang pas spyod pa dri med mchog /ril bu dang ni mi snang ba/ /thams cad du ni ster bar 'gyur/ /dpal ldan 'jam pa'i mchog 'di ni/ /chos kyi gsung gi mchog las 'khrungs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshangs pa'i

dbyangs/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags/ /'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni/ /bsams pa'i phun sum tshogs kun gyi/ /sangs rgyas kun du brtan 'gro na/ /gzhan pa'i lha lta smos ci dgos/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs

so// //snying gar pad ma chen po la/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gnas/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dpa' bo che/ /thugs rje chen po'i thugs ldan pa/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /dung dang kun da zla ltar dag /chos kyi dbyings las yang dag

byung / /chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po la/ /bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug ches/ /de la gnas pa dge ba bsgom/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'di kun dag /gdod nas ma skyes ma byung ba/ /gsang sngags chen po 'di yi ni/ /snying gar yongs su

bsgom par bya/ /'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor lo che/ /kun tu rnam par 'phros pa yi/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs shing zhi/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs 'dzin pa po/ /ral pa'i dbus su dpa' bo che/ /'od dpag med pa ldan pa'i bdag /ston

ka'i zla ba lta bur gsal/ /kun tu nam mkha' yongs gang ba/ /gsang sngags sbyor bdag bsgom par bya/ /rang nyid 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa/ /pad ma'i lus kyis yang dag gang / /kun du pad ma rnams la

ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sku/ /khyad par du bdag dgang bar bya/ /'gro ba brten dang g.yo ba kun/ /snang dang mi snang dngos po ni/ /yang dang yang du blta bar bya/ /gdul bya ma lus sems

la ni/ /stobs po ches ni dgang bar bya/ /kha dog dbyibs ni 'di bzhin du/ /sna tshogs gzugs la cher 'bar ba/ /kun nas yongs su bsdus nas ni/ /sngags pa'i mdun du gzhag par bya/ /de nas sngags pas de ma thag /slar yang rtse gcig

sems kyis ni/ /bkug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang / /dbang du bya ba bsgrub par bya/ /'jig rten dbang phyug thub chen po/ /bcom ldan rnal 'byor can grub na/ /dpa' bo thams cad stsol 'gyur zhing / /rang gi dngos grub mchog rnams dang / /

rnal 'byor thams cad 'dzin nyid dang / /rnam par rgyas pa'i nor ster 'gyur/ /rig pa 'dzin dang 'khor lo can/ /sa dang pha rol phyin sogs dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyang stsol 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /

de'i sngags ni oM A ro li ka /gsang sngags dpal ldan mchog 'di ni/ /rang nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal/ /longs spyod thams cad bkug nas ni/ /skad cig tsam gyis rnam par ster/ /pad ma'i sgrub pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid

'jig rten dbang phyug bsgrub/ /'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid ni/ /srid par bkug nas rnam par ster/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs so// //thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin gzugs/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dge ba ste/ /de yi

dbus su bya ba ni/ /dkyil 'khor rlung dang rab mtshungs pa/ /de yi dbus su de 'dra bsam/ /nyi ma yi ni dkyil 'khor ro/ /de yi dbus su gzi brjid che/ /'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can/ /rdo rje'i lag pa gzi brjid che/ /rgyan rnams kun

gyis rnam par brgyan/ /tshangs pa'i yul sa thams cad du/ /kun nas yongs su gsal bar byed/ /hU~M gi yi ge sgra zab mo/ /dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /rgyal po 'khyil pa dang mtshungs pa/ /zar ma yi ni me tog 'dra/ /'bar ba dmar

pos 'khrigs shing 'jigs/ /bskal pa'i me dang 'dra bar gnas/ /zhal bzhi pa la mche ba bzhi/ /'jig pa'i dus kyi thal ba 'dra/ /sprin gyi sgra dang mtshungs pa yi/ /hU~M gi yi ge bzhi dang ldan/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad ces bya ba/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag

tu bsgom/ /sngags kyi tshig ni oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M`/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga wAn/ bid+yA rA dzA hU~M phaT/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'di/ /kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis/ /'jig rten gsum yang

'gugs byed na/ /bud med gzhan dag smos ci dgos/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen sogs/ /chung ma dang bcas phyag rgyar bcas/ /de dag thams cad 'gugs byed na/ /sdug bsngal can gzhan smos ci dgos/ /nyi ma'i dkyil

'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan snying gar son/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje can gyis sngon du bsgrub/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can 'grub 'gyur/ /rgyal po thams cad sbyin

gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan dag smos ci dgos/ /sngags ni 'dir oM Tak+ki hU~M dzaH gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ /longs spyod ji snyed thams cad rnams/ /de snyed thams cad rnam par ster/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa

sgrub pa'o// //dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /byams pa chen po'i bdag nyid sku/ /snying gar zla ba'i gzugs brnyan 'od/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng ba ldan/ /'jig rten khams ni 'byam klas pa/ /rang bzhin gcig tu

byas nas ni/ /rdo rje yis ni spro ba dang / /dbang bskur ba yi rang bzhin dge/ gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar ba/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs 'dzin pa po/ /ral pa'i dbus su mchod rten che/ /dung dang kun da zla 'od bzang / /bsgoms nas

sems can thams cad la/ /brtan pa'i don du dbang bskur bya/ /yang na sems can thams cad la/ /bu gcig lta bur rnam par spro/ /bsgom pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni/ /gnyis med ma rgyal ba las rgyal/ /spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang / /

thim sogs phyogs dbyes rnam par dbye/ /byams pas kun tu rnam par spro/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /thams cad bdag dang bdag gi bar/ /'das shing shin tu dri ma med/ /ri rab lta bur brten pa'i sems/ /'khrul

pa med cing yi ge bral/ /de ltar sems ni brtan byas nas/ /mnyam med sems can kun dang mnyam/ /bdag nyid byams pa yin no zhes/ /dga' ldan gnas pa'i tshul 'dzin pa/ /cung zad li zhing 'khyil pa'i skra/ /pad pa

ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /rin chen sems ni rnam dag pas/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /'di ni gsang sngags rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni/ oM a dzi tany+dza ya sar+b+ba satwa sa ma yA nu ga ta swA hA gsang sngags

bdag nyid rgyal po 'di/ /byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par khyab/ /byams pa'i thugs ni yid du 'ong / /dang po sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sgrub pa'i thabs mchog bsgom par bya/ /oM mai tre ya tri 'di ni bsgrubs

pa tsam gyis kyang / /dga' ldan du ni gnas par 'gyur/ /sgrib pa kun dang bral ba'i bdag /rang nyid lha yi bu dang mtshungs/ /byams pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni/ /'di ni byams pa lta bur 'gyur/ /byams pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du ni/ /rang bzhin

gyis ni skye bar 'gyur/ /de mdun chos ni legs mnyan nas/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang / /dbang dang ting 'dzin thob nas ni/ /de ni byang chub sems dpar 'gyur/ /mthar yang sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /byams pa'i yid kyis thob par 'gyur/ /byams

pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// //rang gi lus ni thams cad ni/ /nam mkha' mtshungs pa nyid du bsgom/ /chos bdag med pa bskyed nas kyang / /rang nyid nam mkha'i snying por 'gyur/ /gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /mkha' mtshungs dpe

las rnam par 'das/ /nam mkha'i 'od zer gyur pa yis/ /sems can rang gi sems las spro/ /thams cad sems las spros nas ni/ /slar yang rim gyis bsdu bar bya/ /nam mkhar mnyam par 'gro ba blta/ /rang gi de nyid kyis sbyar bya/ /rin

chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rin chen kha dog 'od po che/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis lus brgyan pa/ /lag na rin chen stobs po che/ /rin chen sbyor ba bsgoms pa yis/ /nam mkha'i dam pa 'grub pa yin/ /sngags ni oM A kA sha gar+b+hA ya

swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po stobs po che/ /bcom ldan rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang gi dngos grub thams cad ni/ /ster bar 'gyur de dpyad mi dgos/ /dpa' bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /dngos grub ji snyed bka' stsal pa/ /nam

mkha'i snying po bsgrubs pa yis/ /de dag thams cad myur du ster/ /nam mkha'i snying po sgrub pa'i thabs so// //sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yis/ /kun tu bzang po 'od bzang ba/ /zla ba'i dkyil

'khor dbus su ni/ /sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /rang gi lus ni ji snyed pa'i/ /rang gis phra rab rdul rnams kyis/ /de dag thams cad mtshungs par bya/ /sangs rgyas sku yi sku nyid du/ /yang na ba spu'i khung

rnams su/ /rang gi 'khor los yongs skor nas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs byas te/ /bdag ni kun tu bzang po zhes/ /yi ge lnga pa zhes su bshad/ /'di yi sngags chen bzlas par bya/ /yang na 'dir ni lha gzhan gyis/ /rtag tu sngags su gyur

pa'o/ /oM sA~M hriHkA ya swA hA/ gsang sngags rgyal po che gsang zhing / /gdod nas dag cing rang 'byung ba/ /'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni/ /shes rab dri ma med par 'gyur/ /de yi ye shes dri med cing / /gzugs mdzes pa ni de dang mtshungs/ /

bstan bcos thams cad rab smra ba/ /kun bzang mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro/ /kun tu bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// //zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa yi/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba/ /

dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya/ /gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba dang / /bcud kyis len gyis bde blag tu/ /ring po nyid du mi thogs par/ /sgrib pa rnam sel mtshungs par 'gyur/ /sngags 'byung ba ni/ oM sar+b+ba ni wa ra Na bi Sh+kam b+hi ni swA hA/

oM nI sa ra ya swA hA/ gtso bo gsang sngags 'di 'dzin la/ /rnam par sel bar grags pa ste/ /thams cad bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya kun gyis thams cad du/ /gdod nas skye med rang bzhin gyis/ /gdod nas dag cing 'gyur ba

med/ /de ltar chos 'di shes nas ni/ /lha nyid dang ni mnyam byas nas/ /rnyog pa med cing zag med pa'i/ /rjes su rnal 'byor gyis bsgrub bya/ /uta pal sngon po'i 'dab ma ltar/ /gsal ba'i rnam par gnas pa'o/ /dbang chen

dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i/ /me yis yongs su bskor ba yi/ /phyag na ral gri gzi brjid che/ /yang nas yang du sems byed cing / /dngos grub 'di ni gzi brjid che/ /rnam sel mchog gi dbang phyug ni/ /mtha' las 'das

pa'i dngos grub mchog /thams cad nas ni stsol ba nyid/ /rnam par sel ba sgrub pa'i thabs so// //dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /rdo rje yi ni dbus na bzhugs/ /gser gyi mdog can sku chen po/ /'bar ba l+t+wa bu'i gzi

brjid can/ /snying gar rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnas/ /sa snying zhes byar bdag nyid bsgom/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas/ /rang gi gsang sngags brjod par bya/ /sa snying zhes byar bdag bsgoms nas/ /sngags kyi yi ge mchog bde 'di/ /

oM k+She haHrA dzaHswA hA/ bsam yas sngags mchog 'di yis ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab gsol mdzad/ /sa yi snying po zhes grags pa/ /dam pa'i don du rnal 'byor pas/ /sa'i snying po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// //

zad pa med cing 'khrul pa med/ /zag med mchog gi shes rab can/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /shes rab rdo rje'i bdag nyid dge/ blo gros mi zad rnyed dka' ba/ /'bad pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /me'i dkyil 'khor

dbus su ni/ /gser gyi mdog dang ldan pa'i gzugs/ /rgyal po chen po zla ba'i 'od/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal/ /sngags ni oM a kA ya ma ti swA hA/ sngags kyi yi ge gsang ba 'di/ /thams cad blo gros gsal bar

byed/ /ye shes mi zad 'dod pa yis/ /'bad pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog shes bya/ /shes rab ye shes dri med mdzes/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan dag ci zhig smos/ /blo gros

mi zad pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// //kun nas shes rab chen po can/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten par/ /gser gyi kha dog gzi brjid che/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs can rtag

bsam bya/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs par mdzad/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor ba/ /nam mkha'i bdag po bdag yin zhes/ /lus ngag yid kyis thams cad du/ /thams cad rig pas brtan par bya/ /shin tu dri med byang

chub sems/ /rang snying me long lta bur bsam/ /de nas yi ge tshig bkod de/ /mkha' mdzod bdag ces bdag nyid kyis/ /bsgoms nas rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag /mkha' la rin chen 'byung gnas dang / /yid bzhin nor bu dpag

bsam shing / /de bzhin bum pa bzang po sogs/ /'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug gi/ nye bar 'khor ba thams cad 'bab/ /'jig rten kun gyi rdzas thams cad/ /ji snyed yod pa de dag kun/ /'dir ni skad cig tsam nyid la/ /

dngos grub dam pa stsol bar 'gyur/ /oM ga ga na gany+dzo ga~M swA hA/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi dngos grub che/ /nor gyi rgyun gyi rab 'bebs pa/ /nam mkha'i mdzod ni stobs po che/ /skad cig tsam gyis byed par 'gyur/ /nam mkha'

mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// //rin chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /rin chen phung po char rab 'bebs/ /rin chen gzi brjid mchog tu rol/ /lag na rin chen de bsgrub bya/ /lag na rin chen phyag rgya che/ /zla ba'i dkyil

'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid rin chen zhes bya dang / /rin chen thams cad stsol bar mdzad/ /thams cad rdo rje bzhin bdag nyid/ /pr-i yang ku mdog sngo bsangs 'od/ /dbang chen

dang ni me las byung / /phyag na rin chen cher gsal ba/ /rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya/ /oM rata na pA Ni ra mu swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che/ /rab tu 'bad de bsgrubs na ni/ /'gro ba kun gyi lag tu ni/ /

rin chen thams cad rab rtsol byed/ /lag na rin po che'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// //chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems/ /bdud rtsi chu yis rab gang ba/ /stong gsum zhes ni bsam par bya/ /pad ma gcig gi

steng na gnas/ /de yi steng du gzi brjid che/ /chu lha yi ni gzugs kyi mchog /de steng du yang gsang chen po/ /me'i dkyil 'khor dam pa yin/ /de yi steng du brtson 'grus che/ /rtse mo brgya pa'i rdo rje byung / /de yi steng du pad

chen po/ /'dab ma brgya pa 'od gsal ba/ /de steng rtag tu bsam pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che/ /rgya mtsho'i blo gros zhes grags pa/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /dung dang kun da zla ba'i 'od/ /

rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de yi lag na phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje dung du rab tu grags/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas/ /rang nyid rdo rje yin no zhes/ /rgya mtsho'i blo gros shes rab che/ /slar yang gsang sngags bzla

bar bya/ /sngags ni oM sA ga ra ma ti sa ra swA hA/ sngags 'di mchog dang gtso bo ste/ /shes rab ye shes dri med mdzes/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas myangs na ni/ /shes rab rgya mtsho'i blo gros mtshungs/ /rang nyid sangs rgyas 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /

thugs rje 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /rgya mtsho'i blo gros kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// //dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /ut+pal sngon po 'dab 'dra'i 'od/ /rdo rje snying po brtson 'grus che/ /zla

ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /ji snyed sa steng mtha' dag tu/ /khyab la sdug cing mtho ba yi/ /sra zhing snying po rnam dag pa'i/ /mchog gi yi ge 'gyur med pa/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ni/ /chos kyi sprin la spyod mdzad pa/ /bsam

yas sa ni yang dag brnyes/ /in dra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni/ /yi ge mchog ni steng du 'bar/ /thugs kar rdo rje cher gsal ba/ /rang nyid rnam par 'phro ba bzhin/ /sngags ni oM badzra gar+b+ha hU~M/ 'di ni

sngags mchog gtso bo ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed/ /ye shes yangs pa stsol mdzad cing / /rnam pa kun tu phun tshogs kun/ /sangs rgyas nyid kun stsol mdzad na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /dgug dang gzhug dang

bcing ba dang / /dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed/ /bdag nyid rdo rje yin no zhes/ /nga rgyal rab tu bskyed nas ni/ /rdo rje snying po bzhin du gzhan/ /bdag gi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya/ /thugs kyi rdo rje nyid gyur nas/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa

thob/ /des na rnam pa thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje snying pos yang dag byung / /rdo rje snying po mkha' rdo rje/ /sbyin byed rtse mo drug pas sgrub/ /rdo rje snying po sgrub pa'i thabs so// //dbang chen me las yang dag byung / /nor bu rin chen 'dra ba'i lus/ /

zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /rin chen 'byung ba sems chen po/ /'gro ba snang bar byed de gnas/ /pad ma mkha' 'dra'i rnam pa can/ /phyag rgya de yi snying gar gnas/ /rin chen sbyor bas

bsgom par bya/ /rin chen char pa 'bab par 'gyur/ /sngags ni oM rata na kA raHhrIHrat+na nan da da swA hA/ rin chen 'byung gnas rgyal po 'di/ /mchog rnams kyi ni sa'i dbang phyug / /sbyor ba kun gyis bsgrub par bya/ /rgya che'i nor rnams stsol bar

'gyur/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// // de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyis khro bo bcom ldan 'das bskyed du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'khor los sgyur ba chen pos de skad ces gsol ba btab ma thag kho nar rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba las ches gsang ba

bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /khro bo yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog /rlung khams rab tu gsal ba la/ /me ni dbus nas dbus su'o/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje che/ /'od zer lnga yi phreng bas mdzes/ /de yi

mdun du bya ba yang / /mdung rtse 'bar ba chen po yi/ /de yi g.yas kyi cha ru ni/ /rdo rje chen po 'bar phreng can/ /g.yon nyid du ni be con che/ /rig pa'i phreng bas rnam par spras/ /rgyab tu ral gri'i phyag rgya ni/ /rin chen 'bar bas

rnam par brgyan/ /phyi ngos rnams su rnam khros pa'i/ /khro bo thams cad dgod par bya/ /de yi sngags kyi yi ge gsang / /gsang chen mchog tu 'bar ba'o/ /gzhal du med cing grangs med mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam

pa/ /yi ge gcig pa gsang chen po/ /rgyu yi don du rtogs par byed/ /dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan/ /thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan/ /de nyid gsang ba'i mgon po ni/ /dbyangs bdun par ni bshad pa yin/ /he ru ka dpal rdo rje che/ /'jig

pa'i thal ba mchog tu 'bar/ /sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i bdag /'bar ba'i me yi dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /'jig pa chen po'i dus can gyi/ /char sprin dang ni 'dra ba'i 'od/ /pad ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra/ /'bar ba kun gyis rnam

par brgyan/ /dur khrod me bzhin shin tu yang / /gsal ba'i skra ldan stobs po che/ /rno ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba/ /thod pa'i cod pan steng du 'bar/ /'jig pa chen po'i dus can gyi/ /rgod ma kha yi me ltar gnas/ /smin 'khyog rnam par 'khrugs pa

can/ /g.yon brkyangs pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /khro ba la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'khrugs pa'i gdong / /gar dang sdud par yang dag ldan/ /'jig rten snang ba gar mdzad pa/ /phyag ni brgya phrag stong dang ldan/ /

gcig tu 'gyur zhing rnam pa mang / /rnam mang zhal ldan de dag gi/ sngo ser la sogs mtha' dang ldan/ /zhabs kyang rnam pa du ma ldan/ /sna tshogs mdog ldan rnam par 'khrug /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /khro bo'i rgyal

po stobs po che/ /shin tu sdug cing drag rnams la/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes byar gnas/ /phyag drug zhabs drug snang ba can/ /zhal drug pa ste gsus po che/ /char sprin mchog 'dra cher gnag pa/ /dus mtha'i me dang 'dra bar gnas/ /

mdog chen rgyal po 'khyil pa 'dra/ /zar ma yi ni me tog mtshungs/ /khro bo thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang / /gshin rje mthar byed stobs po che/ /de la sngags kyang oM AHhU~M phaT/ oM ya ma ma thA na hU~M phaT/ oM hrIHSh+DIHbi kr-i tA

na na hU~M sar+b+ba sha t+r+'un nA sha ya sta~M b+ha ya hU~M phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po bdag nyid 'di/ /khyab bdag gdul dka' 'dul ba po/ /gshin rje mthar mdzad khro bo che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gtso/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren cing / /dbang

du yang ni mdzad par gnas/ /rtag tu gdul dka' 'dul mdzad cing / /rdo rje snang mdzad legs par 'dul/ /shin tu gdug pa drag rnams la/ /zhi ba nye bar mi sbyar te/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams khro

bor mdzad/ /thugs rje khro bo'i ngang tshul can/ /'jig rten gsum kyang nges sreg mdzad/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sku/ /thugs rjes khro bo ma lus mchog /gdug pa 'dul bar mdzad pa bskyed/ /

gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// //de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /khro bo gzegs ma zhes su grags/ /dmar po 'bar ba'i khro bo che/ /'jig pa chen po'i dus dang 'dra/ /uta pal sngon po'i 'dab ma bzhin/ /

de yi kha dog rnam par bsam/ /drag po chen po'i zhal bzhi pa/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /spyan gsum pa la khro gnyer bsnyer/ /phyag drug pa la mchog tu 'bar/ /me yi khams dang 'dra ba'i mdog /li khri'i

mdog ltar shin tu dmar/ /de yi khro gnyer bsnyer ba yis/ /gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'byin par byed/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis pa ni/ /yang dang yang du bsam par bya/ /ma lus sa rnams thams cad du/ /son pa'i bdag

nyid chen po des/ /'gugs pa dang ni dbang byed na/ /skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /sngags ni oM ka Ni ka Ni hU~M phaT/ khro bo 'di yi sngags 'dzin pa/ /'jig rten gsum mchog stobs po che/ /sa rnams thams cad sreg
byed na/ /skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /khro bo gzegs ma sgrub pa'i thabs so// //de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur/ /rta mgrin

zhes su bshad pa yin/ /rtag tu 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ /rgya skyags mdog ltar 'bar ba po/ /chu dang gzi brjid can reg pa/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dag dang ldan/ /'dod ldan rnams la 'dod pa 'byung / /gdug pa

can rnams gdug pa 'byung / /zhi ba la'ang zhi ba 'byung / /stobs ldan rnams la stobs kyis sbyor/ /zhal bzhi pa la zhabs bzhi pa/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang mnyam par ldan/ /phyag bzhi pa la brtson 'grus che/ /

seng ge ltar gnas mche ba bzhi/ /rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ni/ /dam pa'i dbang phyug bsgrub par bya/ /skad cig nyid la bslang nas ni/ /thams cad slong ba bsgrub par bya/ /sngags ni oM a mri tod+b+ha bod+b+ha pa hU~M phaTaH oM a mri tod b+ha ba

hU~M phaT/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /g.yon brkyang ba ni rab tu sbyar/ /khro bo'i skyil dkrungs byas nas ni/ /'jig rten thams cad rab nyid bya/ /pad ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po 'di/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang

phyug ste/ /rta yi mgrin pa stobs po che/ /stobs kyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/ /dbang phyug chen po la sogs lha/ /tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang / /mi dang gdug pa'i bsam pa can/ /sa rnams thams cad dgug

par bya/ /rta mgrin sgrub pa'i thabs so// //de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor de/ /gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid gyur/ /khro bo mchog tu mi 'gyur ba/ /kun sbyor bdag gi rnal 'byor

gyis/ /thugs rjes khro ba'i dbang du song / /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sna yi rtse mor yid kyis ni/ /g.yo ba med par bsam par bya/ /slob dpon mi g.yo khro bo che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan/ /
ral gri zhags pa 'dzin pa gsang / /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /pri yang ku ltar ljang ba'i gzugs/ /'khrigs shing byis pa lta bur gnas/ /ma lus pa yi sa rnams kun/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi

mnyam pa/ /khro bo mngag pa bran dang ni/ /pho nyas kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /skye bo kun gyis yongs su gang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan snga na/ /bka' lung yang ni yongs su stsol/ /zad pa'i dus dang 'drar gnas so/ /sngags ni

na maHsa man+ta badzrA NA~M tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hU~M draka hA~M mA~M/ khro bo gzi brjid chen po 'di/ /gzugs mang mnga' ba stobs po che/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed/ /dbang du yang ni mdzad par gnas/ /rlung dang me las

yang dag byung / /'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sogs kun mchog /lus dang ngag yid de bzhin no/ /dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang / /dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya/ /de la sogs pa

mtha' yas mchog /nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas mchog /khro bo'i phyag rgya rang 'byung ba/ /drag po thog ma tha ma med/ /rnam par 'phro ba bzhin du gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan
gyi rgyud las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'di yongs su rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi gzungs thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs rnams thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /gzungs rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor dge/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs kyis ni rnam par mdzes/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag

ldan/ /dkyil 'khor dam par rab tu bshad/ /de yi dbus su pad chen po/ /lo ma kun gyis shin tu mdzes/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'dab ma ldan/ /rdo rje rin chen legs par brgyan/ /de yi dbus su rtag bri ba/ /dpag med shes rab

pha rol phyin/ /de yi nye 'khor thams cad du/ /sna tshogs las ni 'bar rnams la/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma bri/ /shar gyi 'dab ma nas brtsams te/ /thog mtha' nyid kyang brtag par

bya/ /phyag rgya'i yi ge ci rigs par/ /go rims bzhin du rnam par dgod/ /phyogs cha'i dbye ba tha dad kyis/ /kha dog dbye ba thams cad du/ /rnam dbye mchog tu sna tshogs pa/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /de las
'od zer bsam mi khyab/ /sngo ser la sogs dbye ba yis/ /shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /'gro ba thams cad gsal bar bya/ /'dus par gyur nas de dag kun/ /lha nyid kyi ni gzugs ji bzhin/ /shes

rab chen po gzugs chen po/ /'bar bcas mdzes pa'i gzi brjid can/ /de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni/ /sngags kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas brten/ /sku ni gser gyi mdog dang 'dra/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /

rang gi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs/ /du ma'i gzugs kyi gzugs ldan ma/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma ni/ /sems can khams ni rnam sbyong mdzad/ /kun nas sems can rnams kyi yum/ /sems can kun gyi thams cad du/ /thams cad

lus la mnyam par khyab/ /sems kyi rgyun bzhin legs par zhugs/ /zag pa med cing bsam mi khyab/ /dri ma med cing ngang gis stong / /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/ /thog ma tha ma med cing

zhi/ /chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug sku/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/ /bden pa gnyis la rnam par gnas/ /dam pa dang ni dam pa'i don/ /chos kyi sku ru de bshad do/ /dbang po kun kyang rnam par shes/ /sems dang thams

cad thams cad du/ /yid kyi rnam shes zhes su bshad/ /shes rab blo dang blo gros dran/ /lhag mthong dang ni ye shes kun/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang / /rtag dang chad pa'i mtha' dang ldan/ /mtha' gnyis po ni rnam par spangs/ /

kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don/ /rnam pa gnyis su de rab brtags/ /ji ltar bud shing la brten nas/ /me yi sa bon gnas pa dang / /til la til mar ji bzhin no/ /bur shing ro bzhin rab tu brtag /me tog dri ni ji bzhin nam/ /zho la mar

gsar ji bzhin du/ /rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes bsrub/ /bdud rtsi lta bu'i snying po 'byung / /gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan las/ /ji bzhin gtsubs pas me 'byung ste/ /de bzhin ye shes rnal 'byor pas/ /bsrubs pas yongs su

brtag par bya/ /shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ /yang nas yang du bsrub par bya/ /mun pa thams cad rnam sel ba'i/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer ji bzhin bdag /nam mkha' dri ma med brten nas/ /nyi ma zla ba ji bzhin gnas/ /

'char ba yis ni gsal byed pa/ /'bar ba stong phrag gi ni snod/ /mun pa kun 'joms skar ma la/ /kun nas kyang ni mdzes pa yin/ /rnal 'byor pas ni ji ltar sems/ /mkha' bzhin shin tu dri ma med/ /gzung 'dzin las ni nges par

grol/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam dngos po kun/ /de gnas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi/ /ye shes nyi zla mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /shes rab pha rol phyin bsgoms te/ /gsang sngags 'di ni bsam par bya/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i dngos/ /rang bzhin

med par rnam par gnas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal kun/ /gdod nas ma skyes rnyog pa med/ /yi ge de nyid de lta bu/ /gnas dang mi gnas rnam par spangs/ /sde chen bzhi pa'i gnyis pa la/ /thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan/ /

de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ste/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad/ /oM pra dz+nyA swA hA/ oM shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye swA hA/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab 'dis/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed/ /oM ya~M 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi

yum/ /'di ni 'khor lo rnam par bsgyur/ /'dis ni dngos grub thams cad dang / /grub pa nyid ni byed par gnas/ /bstan bcos rab tu 'chad byed dang / /shes bya thams cad khyad par du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams

kun/ /dbang phyug dam pas shes par 'gyur/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// //shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis pa/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po mkha' dang mnyam/ /gser gyi mdog can 'bar ba can/ /

zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs/ /brtson 'grus chen mo bsam gtan bya/ /sngags kyi yi ge rnam par brgyan/ /mchog tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas spyan zhes btags pa yi/ /de yi gsang sngags rab bshad bya/ /nyon

cig sa rnams 'dod pa rnams/ /sngags ni/ oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+ha lo tsa ni sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ 'di de mchog tu gsang ba ni/ /rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu bshad/ /dbang chen yi ge'i mthar thug pa/ /bsgoms pas dge ba rab tu ster/ /chos

kyi phyag rgya 'di shin tu/ /sems can thams cad dbang du byed/ /dpung dang bcas pa myur bgug ste/ /bran du gyur nas nye bar gnas/ /phyag rgya gcig pa'i lha mo che/ /rol cing g.yo ba'i zhal mnga' ba/ /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /

rol cing snang ba'i gar mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /mig gi phyag rgya rab tu sbyar/ /mig gi phyag rgya 'di shin tu/ /'jig rten gsum yang gar byed do/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// //

chu yi dkyil 'khor dgyes pa na/ /bcud kyis len dang mtshungs pa'i mchog /mtha' yas rgyas shing yangs pa yi/ /dri ma med pa'i mkha' la gnas/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /lha mo mchog tu mdzes pa mo/ /'dam bu mda'

rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar/ /grub ma ral pa'i cod pan 'chang / /'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad ma/ /rtag tu nam mkha' bzhin du gnas/ /sngags ni oM ka Te bi ka Te ka Ta~M ka Te swA hA/ gos dkar mo yi phyag rgya che/ /dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra/ /sngags kyi

yi ge'i phreng ba che/ /pad ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas/ /'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad na/ /sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya/ /dam pa'i lha mo 'grub par 'gyur/ /pad ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs/ /zhi ba'i ro dang yang dag ldan/ /

zhi ba'i yi ge mnyam par ldan/ /zhi bar mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi/ /sa gsum sgrub par byed pa'i thabs/ /gos dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// //sngo bsangs dkar mo sna tshogs gzugs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /

zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /sgeg pa'i nyams kyis yongs gang ba/ /'gro ba mtha' dag skyob mdzad ma/ /thugs rje'i thugs dang ldan pa can/ /rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya/ /rol pa yi ni yi ges mchod/ /sngags ni oM tA re

tud tA re tu re swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya mtha' yas mchog /sgrol mas legs par rab tu gnas/ /gsang chen bzhin du thams cad la/ /bcud kyis len dang 'dra ba'i mchog /kun du kun tshe thams cad du/ /dngos grub thams cad

stsol bar mdzad/ /sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// //dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su ni/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo mchog /phyag bzhi spyan ni gsum pa dang / /ral pa'i cod pan dag gis brgyan/ /'dam bu mda' rgyu'i
mdog ltar dkar/ /dpa' ba la sogs nyams kyis brgyan/ /brtson 'grus chen mo 'jigs sel ma/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rab tu 'bar ba'i me bzhin du/ /shin tu gsal ba'i gzi brjid can/ /hU~M

gi yi ge zab mo'i sgra/ /sa gsum po ni 'khrug par mdzad/ /khro gnyer can zhes legs par grags/ /sngags kyi phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sngags ni oM b+ha ya nA sa ni/ trA sa ni trA se/ trA sa ya/ b+h+r-i ku Ti ta TI/ be tA Di be ra Di shwe te

shwe ta dzi ni ni oM Taka ki hU~M dzaHswA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che/ /gsang sngags kun gyi bdag nyid mchog /'gro ba kun kyang 'gugs byed na/ /gdug pa'i sems lta smos ci dgos/ /khro gnyer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
so// //nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje ldan/ /rdo rje'i phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /gzi brjid dkyil 'khor kun nas dkris/ /der gnas rtag tu lha mo ni/ /stobs chen

pr-i yang ku ltar ljang / /phyag bzhi par de bsam par bya/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams cher zhi ba/ /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ma/ /sngags kyi yi ge phreng ba che/ /rdo rje'i

dbus song rab tu gnas/ /khro bo hU~M mdzad gang ba'i mtha'/ /dpa' ba'i nyams la sogs par ldan/ /lha mo 'jig rten gsum rmongs byed/ /dngos grub chen po rab stsol ma/ /skad cig tsam gyis 'gro ba kun/ /nges par

dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje rlung gi phreng ba che/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu gnas/ /'jig pa chen po'i me ltar drag /snang ba chen ma stobs mo che/ /pad ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra/ /rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan/ /

mtshan ni mA ma kI zhes bya/ /lha mo 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod/ /sngags ni oM ku la d+hA trI ye na maH sha~M ka re/ shAn tiM ka re/ g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ti ni/ g+hA ta la g+hu Ti ni swA hA/ oM ku lan d+ha ri b+han d+ha b+han d+ha hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni don gyi
mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin/ /sa gsum po ni 'gugs byed cing / /tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kun/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed la/ /rang gi dbang du gnas pa'ang yin/ /mA ma kI sgrub
pa'i thabs so/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor drag po la/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bskor/ /de yi dbus su snang ba che/ /zla ba'i gzugs kyis rnam par brgyan/ /des spros pa las bdag nyid ni/ /rdo rje lu gu

rgyud kyi sku/ /phyag bzhi ma la lha mo de/ /rdo rje yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan/ /dmar po 'bar ba de yis ni/ /sa gsum po ni 'ching bar mdzad/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /bkug nas dbang du mdzad par

gnas/ /dngos grub thams cad 'dzin pa dang / /de yi thugs kar rdo rje che/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /de yi 'bar ba lcags sgrog gi/ rnam pa rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan/ /nges par phyung nas de dag kun/ /

chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i/ /'jig rten khams ni mtha' dag tu/ /kun nas rnam par bkang nas kyang / /bsgom bya rdo rje thams cad du/ /khro bo dang ldan spro ba'i zhal/ /lto ba 'phyang zhing sku che ba/ /mche ba bzhi

yis rnam par brgyan/ /'bar ba yi ni phreng ba gsal/ /gzugs mdzes drag pa'i gzugs dang ldan/ /sngags ni oM badzra shrIM kha lA yA d+hi pi ta ye/ ma hA ba lA ya/ ma hA bid+yA rA dzA ya te pra dz+wa li ta/ hastA ya na mo nI la kaN+ThA ya ki rA ta

rU pa lam+bo da rA ya/ b+h+ri ku TI mu khA ya/ mA dza ra mu khA ya/ tsa tu da~M Sh+TA ka rA lA ya/ e h+ye hi a s+ya sha rI ra/ ma nu pra bi sh+ya shi ra grIh+Na gr-ih+Na/ hasta pA daM gr-ih+Na bi Sha/ A be sha ya/ ka~M pa ya/ ka ma pa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye/ bi kur+b+ba/

bi kur+b+ba/ tsUr+N+Na tsUr+N+Na/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya marmA Ni/ ni kr-in+ta ya/ hri da ya ts+tshin+da ba la ba la/ kiny+tsi rA ya si/ de ba/ nA ga /yak+Sha/ rAk+Sha sa/ pi shA tsan drA ya/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ dzA ti ma nu sma ra hA hA/ ni d+hi ni d+hi/ ni Shi ni Shi/ badzra shrI~M kha lA A dz+nyA

pa ya ti swA hA/ oM badzra ra Ni hU~M phaT/ oM badzra Ni hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kA li hU~M phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /bcud kyis len ni bde ba dang / /'gro ba thams cad 'bebs pa dang / /gdug pa rnams ni

'ching ba dang / /tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams dang / /lha dang lha min lto 'phye che/ /'jig rten skyong dang klu rnams kyang / /rang gi gnas nas bskyod nas ni/ /grub pa kun gyi dngos grub ni/ /dngos grub 'gugs par
'dod pa yis/ /thams cad gus pas sbyin par byed/ /bud med gzugs kyis bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// //zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad ma dkar po

rab tu gnas/ /phyag bzhi pa la du ma'i gzugs/ /dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra/ /thugs kyi rdo rje'i de nyid yin/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /zhi ba la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /chos rnams kun gyi bdag skyes
mchog /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom/ /sangs rgyas bye ba yang dag 'byung / /der bdag yang dag bsgom pa ni/ /skul byed ma zhes yongs su grags/ /sngags kyi phreng ba'i yi ge ldan/ /kun

nas rnam par 'phro byed pa/ /nam mkha'i khams ni yongs gang ba/ /ji srid de yi spyod yul yang / /de srid de yi 'od zer bsgom/ /rnal 'byor ye shes kyis rab sprul/ /sngags ni/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun+de swA hA/ 'di yi

sngags kyi mchog gtso bo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod pa po/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i dngos grub ster/ /lha dang lha min bcas pas mchod/ /'di yi sdig kun 'dzad byed cing / /phun sum tshogs kun rab stsol mdzad/ /pad

ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang ster byed pa'o/ /skul byed ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag dgyes

pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/ /'dod chags med cing chags bral med/ /

dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya/ /'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog /sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las/ /bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags/ /nus pa yi ni rang bzhin gyis/ /rang bzhin

nyid kyis de grub bo/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bud med 'dis/ /bkur bar bya ba 'os pa yin/ /ngan sbyong rnams kyis kyang 'grub ste/ /rnyed pa kun dang bde dang spro/ /thams cad bud med sgyu mas 'grub/ /rang gi ngo bo

yongs bsgyur ba/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad/ /kun la sna tshogs phyag rgya ni/ /kun la sna tshogs sdom pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor/ /stong pa nyid kyis de nyid

bskul/ /kun la kun nas thams cad du/ /rnam kun kun tshe rang nyid kyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brtan dang g.yo/ /thams cad dngos po rang nyid 'gyur/ /sems dang sems can ting 'dzin dang / /byang chub spyod pa sna

tshogs nyid/ /sa dang pha rol phyin spyod pa/ /dbang nyid du yang de bshad do/ /bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje de bzhin gshegs/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /byang chub sangs rgyas bcom ldan de'o/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ /

pad ma de bzhin pad ma 'dzin/ /nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid/ /sna tshogs de bzhin sna tshogs 'dzin/ /ral gri ral gri 'dzin rgyal po/ /'khor lo de bzhin 'khor lo 'dzin/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal nyid dang ni/ /'di rnams kyi'ang rigs

nyid 'gyur/ /de nyid chags dang chags bral ba/ /'dod dang thar pa ru'ang 'gyur/ /dus gsum dang ni srid gsum mchog /'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa/ /brtan pa thams cad de nyid de/ /rnam pa sna tshogs nyid du

'gyur/ /g.yo ba kun nas sna tshogs pa/ /thams cad du ni de 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs pa sna tshogs mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa/ /dngos po kun du de 'gyur ro/ /

de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha/ /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dpal ldan sgyu ma chen mo 'chang / /rnam snang rtag pa thams cad du/ /rnal 'byor

dbang phyug gtso chen khyab/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lo can mi bskyod/ /che dang rin chen 'byung stobs che/ /tshe dpag med pa kun nas mchog /don yod sna tshogs mdzad pa dang / /rdo rje sems dpa' blta na sdug /dgug pa mchog gi

sbyor ba dang / /legs par mdzad pa de nyid yin/ /rin chen sgron ma de bzhin tog /rdo rje bzhad pa snang ba che/ /rdo rje chos dang rno ba che/ /rgyu dang smra mchog bdud rtsi dang / /las dang go cha gnod sbyin che/ /khu tshur de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /

de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor 'di/ /rdo rje sems dpa' stobs po che/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad hU~M mdzad dang / /rta mgrin zhes ni rnam par grags/ /he ru ka dpal rdo rje che/ /mchog gi dbang phyug gshin rje gshed/ /khro bo gzegs ma snang

ba che/ /rdo rje me ni 'od chen po/ /gzugs rnams kyi ni mchog gcig pu/ /ting nge 'dzin las dbang sgyur ma/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mchog gtso/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa stobs/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po bzhi/ /dbang ni mchog tu 'bar ba dang / /

dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/ /dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang / /rjes dran drug por gyur pa gang / /bsgom par bya bar rab tu gnas/ /de nyid bcom ldan gcig pu ste/ /byang chub yan lag bdun btags pa/ /mtha' gcig yongs

su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis mchog gi mtshan/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i lam po che/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad btags pa/ /stobs bcu yi ni bcu pa nyid/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi bdag nyid gnas/ /byang chub

phyogs kyi chos chen po/ /rnam par dbye ba sum cu bdun/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug ni/ /dgu la gnas par gyur pa dang / /bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po bzhis/ /sems can bsdu bas sdud pa dang / /so so yang dag rig pa

bzhi/ /de bzhin bsrung ba mi mnga' ba/ /skal ba chen po'i mi 'jigs pa/ /mchog tu gyur pa nyid dang ni/ /bsam gtan gzugs med bzhi phrag gnyis/ /tshad med pa yang de bzhin no/ /byang chub sems kyi spyod pa gtso/ /bden pa bzhi ni ston

pa po/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang / /zag bcas zag pa med pa'i mchog /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /dbang phyug mchog gi dbang phyug dang / /skye dgu'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon/ /mchog gi bdag nyid ces su brjod/ /kun

rdzob rjod pa thams cad dang / /sgra rnams kyi ni spyod yul 'gyur/ /rjod du med cing spros pa bral/ /stong pa mkha' mnyam mtshungs pa med/ /tshig mtha' sgra yis rnam dgod pa/ /'jig rten tha snyad tshul du rtogs/ /de tshe lus sogs dbye ba

yis/ /sa rnams kyis ni yongs su brtags/ /sku ni sprul pa nyid du 'gyur/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa yang dag brnyes/ /rdo rje'i sku dang de bzhin du/ /ye shes sku sogs yongs su brtags/ /mtha' yas sku dang sku chen po/ /rin chen sku ni 'od byed

pa/ /pad ma'i sku ni snang ba che/ /thams cad sku ni las bzang byed/ /rtogs par bya ba las kyi sku/ /rnam pa gsum du'ang dbye bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /byang chub sems ni 'od gsal ba/ /kun du 'od kyi sa chen po/ /nyi ma'i

dkyil 'khor gzi brjid ldan/ /gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya/ /zla ba'i 'od ni 'od gsal ba/ /gsum pa nam mkha'i 'od ces bya/ /mkha' bzhin legs par rab tu gnas/ /rdo rje 'od mtha' gang zhig sa/ /bzhi pa de ni yid 'ong ba/ /bsam pa

brtan pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje zhes ni yongs su bsgrags/ /lnga pa rin chen 'od ces bya/ /dbang bskur bar ni rab tu gnas/ /drug pa pad mo 'chang zhes bya/ /pad bzhin rab tu rnam par snang / /rang bzhin gyis ni chos nyid dag /bdag gi med cing yongs

bzung med/ /bdun pa las kyi 'od ces bya/ /sangs rgyas phrin las mdzad pa che/ /brgyad pa dpe med pa zhes bya/ /dpe ni de la yod ma yin/ /dgu pa dpe dang bral zhes bya/ /dpe rnams thams cad rab 'jug pa/ /bcu pa shes rab 'od ces bya/ /

sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med/ /bcu gcig kun mkhyen nyid ces bya/ /sa chen po ni 'od gsal ba/ /bcu gnyis so sor bdag rig pa/ /rnal 'byor ye shes yongs rdzogs nyid/ /sa chen po ni 'di dag rnams/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam du/ /

sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos/ /rnal 'byor ye shes gang brjod pa/ /thams cad nyid ni mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las

sngags kyi de kho na nyid do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/

de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi de ma thag nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam

par gzhag nas mnyam par gzhag pa'i de ma thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje la rjes su bcug nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs

nas rnam par bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid rtogs nas ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la

'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yod do zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas

'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs

te thal mo sbyar nas btud de 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang du zhugs pas
sems can rnams thabs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so/ /'jam dpal khyod gang slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su zhugs pa ni 'jam dpal khyod legs so

legs so/ /de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bka' stsal pa// //de nas

dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog /snying po chen po'i rgyan ces bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi dang ni mnyam par ldan/ /

'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje snying po yongs bskor ba/ /byang chub shing gis nye bar mdzes/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor grwa rnams dang / /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /

rdo rje pad ma thams cad du/ /las kyi rdo rje thams cad du/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /dril bcas sna tshogs mchog dang ldan/ /rgyal mtshan sgreng ba rlung bskyod pa'i/ /gos dang me tog chun pos spras/ /

zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes/ /ral gri rdo rje uta pa la/ /lcags kyu la sogs sna tshogs brgyan/ /chu yis dkyil 'khor yongs bskor ba/ /khor yug bzhin du rnam par gnas/ /de la'ang sgo dang sgo khyud sogs/ /

mkhas pa yis ni spro bar bya/ /de yi nang du bri bar bya/ /'khor lo chen po rab tu gnas/ /cha brgyad kyis ni yongs su bskor/ /dkyil 'khor legs par rnam par spras/ /rdo rje'i thig gis yongs su bskor/ /rdo rje'i

'khor lo cher 'bar ba/ /de yi dbus su snying po che/ /rdo rje'i snying po zhes su bshad/ /de yi steng du rdo rje che/ /rdo rje pad ma rab tu gnas/ /pad ma'i steng du rdo rje che/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan/ /gsang ba che ba

zla bas brgyan/ /'grel pa'i bshad par 'di bzhin 'dug /dung dang kun da zla ba dkar/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan du bshad/ /de yi steng du legs bzhugs pa/ /khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad che/ /zla ba'i mdog ldan 'dzum bcas pa/ /

ting 'dzin ldan gnas sdig pa bcom/ /rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par spras/ /sna tshogs 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /rin chen chen po'i phreng ba ches/ /spras pa rnam par dgod par bya/ /de sngags rtag tu shes bya ba/ /yi ge yi ni

mchog gtso bo/ /sha sa'i sde ba gsal byed ni/ /mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu gcig po/ /drug pa'i dbyangs kyis legs gsal ba/ /thig le nA das legs par brgyan/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung 'khor lo yi/ /don can rab tu bskyed

par bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor can/ /gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha/ /chos kyi sku ni ye shes che/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bshad/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / ye shes kyi 'od zer dang /

de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje nyid du rang gi bdag nyid byin gyis
brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir 'khod do/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor mi bskyod pa/ /me yi dkyil 'khor ye shes

'od/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor 'od dpag med/ /rdo rjes rnam gnon rlung dkyil 'khor/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa' byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i rgyan gyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs

ka nas phyung ba'o/ /oM badzra sa twa de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams phyung ste/ rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad

snang bar byas te gsal bar gyur nas de nas rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skus 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su gshegs nas 'jig rten

gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad de/ sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba mngon par rdzogs nas slar yang gcig tu 'dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor

gyi dbang phyug chen po'i rdo rje snying po'i thugs kar gnas te ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ e ma ho rdo rje snying po bdag /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /snying po ye shes rnam dag pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid gyur nas/ /byang chub sems dpa'

brtan bskyed de/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /gang zhig brtan phyir lus min yang / /sangs rgyas sku nyid du gyur to/ /de nas rdo rje'i sku byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon nas bcom ldan

'das mi bskyod pa'i nye 'khor thams cad rnam pa bzhis phye ste/ dkar po ser po dmar po ljang gu'i mdog tu mngon par sprul nas rang gi sngags kyi yi ges zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te gnas par gyur to/ /dgug pa'i ting

nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra rA dzaH rjes su chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra rA ga /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs par mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra sA d+hu/ de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor la dbang

bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra rata na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra te dza/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra ke tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

bzhad pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra hA sa/ de bzhin du 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor yang thugs rje'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra d+har+m+ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na/ dam pa'i chos kyi

'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra he tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' smra ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra b+hA Sha/ de bzhin du rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ las sna tshogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra kar+m+ma/ brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra rak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra yak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur bcings pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra san+d+hi/ de nas bcom

ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas 'di phyung ngo / /oM badzra d+hA

tu hU~M/ rang gi rig pa mchog ni/ oM badzra d+hA twI shwa ri badzri Ni/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di phyung ba/ oM ak+Sho b+h+ya oM oM dz+nyA na muSh+Ti tsit+ta badzre badzri Ni hU~M/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam

tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM rata na sa~M b+ha ba trA~M/ oM badzra dz+nyA na gar b+ha sti hU~M de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi

rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM a mi tA b+ha hrIH oM badzra d+hA ri Ni hU~M/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gnon pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a~M/ oM badzra ma hA ba le hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la rnam

par gzigs shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i snying po 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa ma tA dz+nyA na badzra hU~M/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di dag bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i bdag nyid rtogs nas rdo rje mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po bka' stsal pa/ oM badzra sa ma tA dz+nyA na bud+d+ha hU~M/

de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnams phyag na rdo rjer mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma sa ma tA dz+nyA na badzra

hU~M/ de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis kyang slar yang phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'khod par mthong ngo / /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba satwa sa ma tA pra pany+tsa bud d+ha hU~M/ de nas 'di phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs

ka nas phyag na rdo rje rnam par phyung ste slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na gnas nas bka' nod cing 'khod do/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la byin gyis brlab par byos shig /de de bzhin no zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

thugs ka nas dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs te brtan par gyur nas rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha rnams phyung ste/ lha mo de rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi grwa rnams su de bzhin du rnam par gnas so/ /sgo rnams su

sgo skyong ma rnams dang / mtshams rnams su gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams bshad do/ /de dag gi sngags su gyur pa ni oM badzri me g+he TA~M TA~M/ 'khor lo'i mtshams su gzhag par bya'o/ /\u0f00 sma ra badzri Ni ha~M/ oM sha rad badzre

a~M a~M oM badzri Ni ki li ki li hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa chen po'i mchod pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor grwa dang / mtshams rnams su dri rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye bar gnas par dgod

par bya'o/ /oM badzra gan+d+he hU~M/ oM ma d+hu badzri Ni/ g+hu~M g+hu~M/ oM ma nod b+ha ba badzri Ni hI/ oM badzri she shi re ho ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rol pa chen po'i lha mo sgo'i mtshams rnams su gzugs la sogs pa'i oM badzra rU pe/ oM

badzri shap+de/ oM badzri gan+de/ oM badzri ra se/ oM badzri spar she/ mnyes par byed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu dga' ba rdo rje'i snying po ni/ oM sa ma ya hoHsu ra s+t+wa~M/ dga' bde chen po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'dis de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kun nas mnyes pas dkyil 'khor thams cad la brtan par gyur nas/ dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzod/ /dgug dang legs par rab gnas dang / /ji bzhin gnas su sbyar ba nyid/ /

kun nas dgyes mdzad sangs rgyas kun/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin dge/ sngags kyi tshig rnams kyang / oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn badzra a~M ku sha dzaH oM pra bi sh+ya hU~M/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ oM sa ma ye b+han+d+ha tiSh+Tha b+ha ga wAn/

oM tu Sh+ya ho b+ha ga wAn badzra A be sha aH 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sgo'i phrin las so/ /de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor 'bri ba la byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang po dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgod par bya'o/ /sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas slob ma bcug ste/ dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byas nas slob ma dang bcas pas thabs gcig tu de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad la nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de la dang po kho nar re shig dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon ni dam tshig thams cad shes pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos

dngos grub thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug lta bu/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la

bslab par bya'o/ /de nas 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar 'gyur ba ni skyil dkrung bcings nas dri la sogs pa rnams kyis lag pa gnyis byugs nas phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu bsgrub par bya'o/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsdams

pa byas te sor mo phan tshun bcings nas skyil dkrung gi dbus su rdo rje bsdams par gzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni gar gyi tshogs kyi sbyor bas so/ /rdo rje

bsdams pa de nyid rked pa'i phyogs su gzung ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo lcag kyu ltar gzung ba ni rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid mda' 'phen pa lta bu'i sbyor ba ni rdo rje mda'i

phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las legs so ba sbyin pas rgyab tu 'jog pa ni rdo rje legs pa'i'o/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya rnams so/ /rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid dpral bar 'jog pa ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las

'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor ba ni rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor sbyar ba ni tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /kha'i thad du bskor ba ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid kha'i

thad du bskor ba ni rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid snying kar byas pa ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid 'khor lo ltar yongs su bskor ba ni rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid snying kar bsgreng ba ni rdo rje smra ba'i phyag chos kyi phyag rgya rnams so/ /

rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid gar nyid du ston pa ni las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis spyi bo dang snying ka dang mgrin par 'jog pa ni rdo rje bsrung ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa 'gram pa gnyis su 'jog pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi

phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid snying gar btsir ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de bzhin du sgeg mo dang bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i sbyor bas lha mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /rol cing rnam 'khor dgod

pa dang / /sgeg dang snying rje'i bdag nyid dang / /dpa' dang khro sogs chos bdag nyid/ /rang nyid zhi ba'i bdag nyid nyams/ /phyag rgya thams cad rab tshogs pa/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /bdag nyid rdo rje'i gar byed dam/ /skyob

pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu sbyar/ /thams cad grub par 'dod sogs kyis/ /skyil dkrung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /de phyir gnyis med rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi drang po'i sku/ /sgeg pa'i

sbyor bas rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi ba'i spyan/ /snyems bcas rdo rje can gyir dgongs/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje spyan/ /ting 'dzin dbye ba las shes bya/ /'khrugs pa'i lta stangs khro rnams kyis/ /btsun mo

rnams kyi rol pa nyid/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang / /sdig spyod rnams kyi lta stangs steng / /chos rnams kun gyi rjes 'jug pa'i/ /shugs kyis lta stangs phyag rgya'o/ /tshogs dang pho nya pho nya mo'i/ /lta stangs rnam pa

sna tshogs nyid/ /mchu yi phyag rgya yongs ldan pa/ /g.yo ba med cing mi 'gul ba/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed/ /mtshams sbyor cung zad yang dag ldan/ /rnam 'gyur med cing mtshungs med

gnas/ /rol pa'i yi ge yang dag ldan/ /mchu yi phyag rgya rdo rje can/ /rnam 'gyur can dang 'khor ba can/ /khro bas so ni yongs su bsdam/ /'di ni khro ba'i phyag rgyar bshad/ /mchu yi phyag rgya gzugs mdzes can/ /'jig rten pa rnams

mchu'i phyag rgya/ /rnam 'gyur 'jig cing gzugs dang bral/ /shin du mnag dka'i 'dod chags dang / /sdang dang rmongs las thams cad du/ /rol cing rnam 'khor dang ldan pa/ /g.yo bcas rab tu 'phro ba yang / /mchu yi phyag rgyar shes par

bya/ /lha mo pho nya tshogs kyi yang / /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /lta stangs mchu la sogs pa'i ming / /phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdu ba/ /skyob pa rnams kyis kun shes bya/ /ji srid sku yi dbye ba dang / /dbang po la sogs rab dbye

dang / /de dag phyag rgya mtha' yas mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyis brtags pa nyid/ /sna tshogs sku ni gzi brjid che/ /tshad med yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed/ /rdo rje

snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid gsang ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bka' stsal pa/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni

mdzes par byas/ /sna tshogs khams ni bsam yas mchog /dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /sna tshogs pad mo de bzhin gzhan/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas sku

gzugs yid 'ong ba/ /mgon po sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan/ /'bar ba mchog gis brgyan pa po/ /de sngags rtags su shes bya ba/ /dang po'i dbyangs dang gnyis pa'o/ /de yi nye 'khor thams cad du/ /'khor lo can brgyad bri bar bya/ /

dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /'khor lo kun tu 'bar ba gzhag /'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /pad ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas/ /sgeg sogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /ji ltar sngon bzhin bri bar bya/ /nye bar mkho ba'i mchod kun

gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya/ /dgug sogs cho ga'i sbyor ba ni/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma ji bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor nye bar spyod pa kun/ /cho ga 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i rtog pa'o/ /de nas dkyil

'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal zhes/ /bya ba rdo rje hU~M mdzad grags/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /de yi nang du 'khor lo ni/ /dkyil

'khor brgyad pa lta bu'o/ /de yi dbus su khro bo che/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal yang / /khro gnyer ldan zhing smin ma 'khyog /spyan gsal 'bar ba chen po ba/ /cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /rnam par dgod

cing slar khro ba/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni/ /bka' zlog dbang phyug chen po gnon/ /sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas spras/ /in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /phyag bzhi pa la spyan gsum pa/ /zhal bzhi pa la thub par

par dka'/ /be con dang ni zhags par brjod/ /dang po na ni rdo rjer bshad/ /gnyis pa zhags pa sdigs mdzub can/ /phyag gnyis khu tshur dam pa mchog /khu tshur gnyis ni rab tu brtag /mthe chung gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba/ /lu gu

rgyud kyis rnam par sbrel/ /snying gar phyag rgya legs gzhag nas/ /sdigs mdzub gnyis kyis bsdigs par mdzad/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya ba'i/ /phyag rgya mchog tu thub par dka'/ /sngags ni ming gi de nyid ldan/ /'bar

ba'i phreng ba mnyam par 'khrigs/ /dkyil 'khor de'i gnas rnams su/ /cha rnams kun ni thams cad nas/ /phyag rgya thams cad mnyam par bri/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam gnas par/ /ral gri 'khor lo gzhu dang mda'/ /de bzhin du

ni dgra sta nyid/ /de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas mchog /mdor bsdus nas ni phyag rgya dgod/ /de ltar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par bkod nas nye bar mkho ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o/ /'jig rten gsum las

rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhes su bshad/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /dar dang me tog chun pos

brgyan/ /de dbus dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /chu zhes bya ba'i ming can no/ /de yi dbus su pad chen po/ /'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba/ /zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i mdog /ral pa'i

cod pan 'dzin pa can/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas spras/ /sku rnams thams cad kun nas spro/ /mtha' yas rab 'byam rgya che ba'i/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam

la/ /de yi sngags su yongs grags pa/ /sha Sha'i sde yi mtha' dge ba/ /k+Sha yig don ldan sngon byung ba/ /rgyu yi don du rab sgrub byed/ /bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis spyi bor mnan/ /me yi sa bon gsal bar byed/ /thig le sgra ni mchog tu

sbyin/ /'jig rten dbang phyug zhes bya'i mtshan/ /de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad/ /pad mo'i thal mo rab tu brkyang / /bris pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag bshad/ /dbyug gu ril ba spyi blugs bri/ /mdun du bgrang phreng pad ma yi/ /rgyal

po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhag /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /phyag rgya mchog tu 'bar de dag /'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /ji ltar rigs par dgod par bya/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba/ dkyil 'khor

gyi rgyal po'o// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /gzhan ni rab tu bshad par bya/ /dpa' bo rin chen snying po yi/ /rdo rje rin chen zhes su bshad/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /

de yi dbus su rin chen che/ /yan lag brgyad pa mchog tu 'bar/ /de dbus rin chen pad ma ni/ /rin chen phreng bas rnam par mdzes/ /de dbus ma ra ka ta 'dra/ /rin chen rdo rje cher 'bar ba/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /rin chen

phreng bas rnam par mdzes/ /mdun du kun gyi dbang bskur gtso/ /rin chen de yi gtso bo mchog /g.yas su pad ma rA ga ste/ /rgyab tu in dra nI la'o/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen g.yon/ /phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs mchog /sna tshogs

rin chen rnam par brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa yi ni/ /gnas rnams su ni gzhag par bya/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis/ /de yi sngags su yongs grags pa/ /bzhi pa'i sde yi dang po gang / /me yi sa bon gyis

gsal byas/ /dbyangs kyi gnyis pas kun nas mnan/ /dbang sgyur ba ni steng du gnas/ /de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad/ /rin chen snyim pa rgyab bskums te/ /rin chen rnam pa legs byung ba/ /de ni rdo rje rin chen no/ /
rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag
ldan/ /rdo rje phreng bas rnam par mdzes/ /de yi dbus su zhal bzhi pa'i/ /'khor lo bzhin du yongs bskor ba'o/ /de yi dbus su pad chen po'o/ /kha dog sna tshogs yongs 'bar ba/ /de yi dbus su brtson

chen po/ /rdo rje sna tshogs yongs su bri/ /rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin mdzes pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che/ /sangs rgyas phreng bas rnam par mdzes/ /de yi sngags ni yang dag
bshad/ /bcu gnyis pa yi dbyangs kyi mtha'/ /mya ngan 'das don legs gsal byas/ /sgeg sogs rig ma thams cad kyis/ /de bzhin rang gi phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje'i thig le yongs su ldan/ /sna tshogs bkra ba
mchog tu 'bar/ /de yi dbang bskur phyag rgya yis/ /mchod pa kun gyis thams cad nas/ /kun nas yongs su bskor ba yi/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas
dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /shes rab ye shes 'khor lo che/ /sngags kyi yi ges rnam par brgyan/ /de yi dbus su pad chen po/ /'dab ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes/ /de yi

lte ba'i dkyil du ni/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa/ /sku mdog dmar zhing 'dzum bcas pa/ /sna tshogs gzugs can ral gri can/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /ral gri'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /

gsang sngags chen po yi ge lnga/ /de yi drung du legs par gnas/ /dbyangs kyi bcu gnyis gsang sngags ni/ /thugs ka ru ni yang dag gnas/ /phyi rol nyid ni gru bzhi mdzes/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /

rta babs bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor/ /sgo bzhi yis ni shin tu mdzes/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyid/ /de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /sngon du
bshad pa'i cho ga yis/ /mchod sogs cho ga rgyas pa nyid/ /gzhug pa'i cho ga de bzhin du/ /ji ltar dkyil 'khor 'dir mthong bzhin/ /shes rab ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ro// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po

mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi nang du bri bya ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla na

med/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung phreng ba ni/ /'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /'khor lo'i dbus su brtson chen po/ /rdo rje'i rgyu ni stobs po che/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /kha dog nag po gzi brjid

che/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor mdzad/ /de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni/ /rgyu yi don du so sor bskyed/ /dbyangs drug dang ni yang dag ldan/ /thig le phyi mos rnam par brgyan/ /rang gi yi ge'i phreng ba che/ /'khor lo gnyis kyis

rnam par brgyan/ /de yi mdun du dung yin la/ /rgyab tu zhags par brjod par bya/ /rdo rje'i thal mo phyag rgya che/ /'khor lo bzhin du rab tu gnas/ /mchod pa thams cad rab tu brtag /ji ltar dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin/ /de lta'i

dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/ /thog mar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /dngos grub thams cad yang dag 'bar/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad

bya ba/ /thog ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi thig gdab bo/ /de yi dkyil du snang ba che/ /mkha' bzhin shin tu 'od gsal ba/ /sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod/ /pad ma'i rgyal po rab tu bzhugs/ /zla ba'i mdog can gzi

brjid che/ /sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog /gzhon nu rab tu brjid pa'i zhal/ /nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags/ /sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas spras/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor brgyan par mdzad/ /'di yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che/ /dbyangs dgu

pa la thig le dang / /nA da yis ni rnam par brgyan/ /sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa la/ /thig le nA das rnam par brgyan/ /de yang gtso bo'i gsang sngags 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i mdzod ni rab bskor mdzad/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /sngags kyi phreng ba

mchog ldan pa/ /ma lus pa yi sa rnams kun/ /thams cad nas ni nam mkha'i tshul/ /tog ni phyag rgyar gyur pa de'i/ /de bzhin du ni nges par bcing / /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /nam mkha' yi ni mdzod de la/ /gal te bdag ni grub 'dod na/ /

mchod pa kun gyis rnam par mchod/ /nam mkha'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bo/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /

khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/ /der yang rdo rje me yi mchog /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'dod/ /de yi dbus su gzi brjid che/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin bla na med/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /pad ma'i rgyal po la rab gnas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i lus/ /

bdud rnams thams cad rab 'joms mdzad/ /de sngags yi ger gyur pa ni/ /sha Sha'i sde tshan mthar dge ba/ /rgyu yi don du legs gsal bya/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskor/ /sngags kyi yi ge phreng ba che/ /'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /de lta'i dkyil

'khor bris nas ni/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin de yis ni/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /sgyu ma thams cad gzhom par bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'o// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo

bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo che/ /lcags kyu yis ni rnam pas mdzes/ /dbus su bcom ldan rdo rje rgyal/ /lcags kyu la ni rab tu bzhugs/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams thams cad

rab tu 'bar/ /rdo rje lcags kyu khu tshur che/ /'bar ba 'phro bas rnam par brgyan/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par mdzad/ /sngags kyi yi ges legs par sbyar/ /sha Sha'i sde yi drung gnas pa/ /byed pa'i rgyu ru legs par
gnas/ /dbyangs drug pa yis legs par phye/ /zla phyed thig les legs par brgyan/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgya legs par sbyar/ /'gugs par byed la don yod pa'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /rdo rje
lcags kyu mchog tu dge/ dgug pa la sogs thams cad la/ /'gro ba 'dul ba yongs su bsdu/ /don yod rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu
bshad bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dngos grub dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /dkyil
'khor lcags kyu'i rnam pa can/ /de yi dbus su gru gsum grags/ /lcags kyu mchog tu dge ba'o/ /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje rgyal po stobs po che/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams
kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /gzi brjid chen po dkar dang dmar/ /zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin dge ba/ /de yi gsang sngags yang dag bshad/ /don yod 'bras bu stsol ba po/ /sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa ni/ /gnyis

'gyur nyid du rnam par gnas/ /de yi thig le mya ngan 'das/ /sngags kyi phreng ba gzhan gyis bskor/ /sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che/ /'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /sgo skyong ba dang mchod pa yang / /sbyor ba ji bzhin rnam par
dgod/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /mchod pa thams cad yongs su sgrub/ /rdo rje rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /sangs rgyas

dpa' bo thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje chags pa zhes su bshad/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /chags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /thams cad dmar

pos rab dregs pa/ /dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin/ /de yi dbus su pad chen po/ /'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje chags pa bri bar bya/ /pad ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /phyag

bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum 'od kyi phreng ba can/ /de yi phyag rgya mchog tu ni/ /mdzes pa yi ni mda' gzhur 'gyur/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa'i lus/ /'gro ba kun la ches mchog gyur/ /de yi gsang

sngags mdzes gyur pa/ /rdo rje chags pa mchog tu bde/ /sha Sha'i sde yi mthar gyur pa/ /k+Sha yi yi ge'i sngon du gnas/ /dbyangs dgu pa dang yang dag ldan/ /sngags kyi phreng bas yang dag brgyan/ /me tog mda' ni yongs su 'phen/ /
re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod byed/ /rdo rje chags pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu

bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje legs pa zhes grags pa/ /gnyis su med pa'i dga' ba'ang 'phel/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /de yi dbus su cher mdzes pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa gru bzhi

pa/ /de yi dbus su pad chen po/ /ze 'bru yis ni nye bar mdzes/ /de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni/ /zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang dag 'bar/ /der gnas dpa' bo bsam par bya/ /rdo rje legs pa stobs po che/ /dung dang kun da zla ba

dkar/ /kha ba ba zho'i 'od ltar mdzes/ /legs so stsol ba tshim par mdzad/ /ting nge 'dzin dbang mang po sgyur/ /rdo rje sgeg mo sogs mchod pa/ /de bzhin me tog bdug pa sogs/ /sgo yi skyong ba nyid kyang ni/ /rab tu 'bad

de bri bar bya/ /de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni/ /gsang ba chen po mchog tu 'bar/ /ha yi yi ge sngon gang de/ /sems can don ni rab sgrub byed/ /thig le gnyis dang yongs su ldan/ /legs stsol bas ni rnam par gnas/ /de lta'i

dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /mchod pa thams cad rab tu bskor/ /bdag nyid dag pas gzhug pa sogs/ /thams cad yongs su spyad par bya/ /rdo rje legs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /

yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje gzi brjid zhes su grags/ /rdo rje nyi ma blo gros ldan/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya/ /

de yi nang du bri bya ba/ /rdo rje nyi ma 'od chen po/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i steng du ni/ /gru gsum rnam pa las byung ba/ /de yi dbus su gzi brjid che/ /'bar ba yi ni me lta bu/ /pad ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /ze 'bru yis ni shin tu

mdzes/ /de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni/ /rdo rje gzi brjid stobs po che/ /bzang po'i mtshal dang mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /rgya skyegs khu ba mtshungs pa'i mdog /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o/ /de yi sngags su

yongs grags pa/ /kun nas sangs rgyas mtshungs pa nyid/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yi mtha'/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sngags kyi phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ldan/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris

nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya/ /rdo rje gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor ro// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ming / /bdag nyid chen po rdo rje'i tog /

gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /mchog tu 'bar ba yi ni rlung / /zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan

yongs bsgreng ba/ /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /zhal bzhi pa la gzi brjid che/ /in dra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs/ /phyag bzhi pa la snang ba che/ /de yi gsang sngags gzi

brjid che/ /sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la/ /me yis rab tu gsal byas pa/ /tog gi phyag rgyas yongs su bskor/ /sngags kyi phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya/ /rdo rje tog gi

dkyil 'khor ro// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje bzhad pa zhes grags pa/ /rdo rje bzhad pa mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /

dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de dbus zlum po ni/ /in dra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /de bzhin chu ni gzi brjid can/ /phyag rgya 'khor los rnam par mdzes/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /ston ka'i zla ba 'dra ba'i 'od/ /'gro ba mtha' dag

snang mdzad pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /dbang phyug thams cad yang dag ldan/ /de yi gsang sngags gsang chen po/ /rgyu yi don du bsgrub par bya/ /stong pa mngon brjod bsam mi khyab/ /rang ming rtogs pas

mtshan pa'o/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya/ /rdo rje bzhad pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis

ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dngos grub dkyil 'khor yang dag bri/ /de yi steng du 'ang pad ma che/ /pad ma me las yang dag byung / /gru gsum mchog tu mdzes pa po/ /sum mdo ris kyis rnam par brgyan/ /

chos dbyings yi ge'i de kho na/ /thams cad gzi brjid bdag nyid dge/ de yi bdag gi de nyid ni/ /'phro ba'i ma ra ka ta 'dra/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /gnyis pa'i mdog tu gyur pa ni/ /pad ma
