rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /ji srid ngag gi 'khor lo ni/ /smra ba'i dbye bar rab tu gnas/ /thams cad so sor gsal bar byed/ /sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mchog rmad byung / /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams

cad rab mchod bya/ /rdo rje smra ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya/ /de yi dbus su

go cha che/ /rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de yi dbus su brtson chen po/ /rdo rje bsrung ba yang dag bri/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che/ /thams

cad bsrung ba mchog tu dge/ phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan/ /gsang ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog /de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che/ /sha Sha'i sde yi mthar gnas mchog /mgon po'i rgyur ni mngon par brjod/ /

steng du nA das brgyan par byas/ /kun nas kha dog du ma yis/ /yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya/ /sngags kyi phreng ba yongs su ldan/ /glog gi phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /mchod pa thams

cad rab bsgrub bya/ /rdo rje bsrung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /

khu tshur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ba/ /gzi brjid chen po gser gyi mdog /'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba/ /de yi steng du gzi brjid che/ /rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che/ /phyag bzhi pa

la zhal bzhi pa/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa po/ /kun da dung dang zla ba dkar/ /khu tshur de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur/ rdo rje nyid du mnyam nyid mchog /gnyis su med pa mchog gsang ba/ /

khu tshur gyis ni sdud par bshad/ /de sngags mchog tu dga' ba ni/ /brjod du med nyid stsol mdzad pa/ /sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni/ /'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku/ /'di yi sngags la rnam

par gnas/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur mchod par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor ro// //de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba ni/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi

mtha' klas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub stsol bar mdzad/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor mchog /de bzhin gru bzhir bris nas ni/ /sgo khyud la sogs rnam par spang / /rtse gsum paT+Ti sa dang ni/ /

dung dang pad ma sogs pas brgyan/ /thog mar dbang phyug chen po dgod/ /rtse gsum pa yi phyag rgyar ldan/ /khyu mchog la zhon mig gsum pa/ /stag gi lpags gyon phyag bzhi pa/ /thal bas byugs shing mgo bo la/ /ral pa'i

tshogs ni rab 'phyang ba/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ /phyag 'tshal ba ni 'di bri'o/ /de yi sngags ni/ oM tri sa sru~M hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni cher gsang ba/ /bdag nyid chen po dbang phyug che'i/ /

dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid la dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su nag po chen po gzhag par bya'o/ /lag pa stong gis gar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dga' byed dbang phyug dang lhan cig phyag

bzhi pa spyan gsum pa'o/ /lag pa stong gis gnas pa'o/ /rang gi sngags ni/ oM ma hA kA la hU~M b+h+yoH oM nan di ke shwa ra hU~M b+h+yo/ 'di bzlas na dngos grub thams cad byed do/ /dga' byed dbang phyug dang / nag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor

ro/ /de nyid kyi ni cho ga yis/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi thig gdab bya/ /der ni pad ma yang dag bri/ /pad ma'i dbus su sbrang rtsi byed/ /la sogs ming po gsum bri'o/ /gzhu yi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/ /sbrang rtsi byed dang rgyal ba byed/ /de

bzhin nyid du 'ang sgrub byed do/ /me tog mda' dang yongs su ldan/ /rang gi ming rtogs mtshan ma can/ /sngags ni oM ma d+hU kr-ita sna~M oM swA~M oM d+h+wa na swa/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod gzugs can/ /dbang du byed pa thams cad sgrub/ /

sbrang rtsi rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bris nas dbus su thig bzhi gdab bo/ /dbus su tu ma bu ru'o/ /shar gyi 'dab mar rgyal ba'o/ /lho ru rnam par rgyal ba'o/ /nub tu mi thub pa'o/ /

byang du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/ /de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bris nas go rim ji lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags dgod par bya'o/ /oM tu~M bu ru hU~M/ oM dza ye hA~M/ oM bi dza ye hA~M/ oM a dzi te hAM/ oM a pa rA dzi te hA~M/ dga' ba 'di dag lag

g.yon du/ /khu tshur g.yon pas rab grub stsol/ /'di yi phyag rgya nyid gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags/ /lag par dgod pa rab bshad bya/ /go rim ji lta ba bzhin du/ /tum bu ru ni mthe bor dgod/ /sdigs mdzub

la ni rgyal ba gnas/ /rnam rgyal gung mo nyid la'o/ /mi thub de bzhin ming med la/ /gzhan gyis mi thub mthe'u chung la/ /lag pa'i dbus su yi ge oM/ /dgod bya de nyid lag pa'i rgyab/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i mthar thug tu/ /dgod par bya ba mchog tu

bshad/ /sbyor dang rnam par dbye ba yang / /phyag rgya kun spyod yongs su bsdu/ /so sor bstan par bya ba nyid/ /sor mo rnams la khyad par du/ /dbang dang dgug dang rmongs la sogs/ /rengs byed la sogs go rims bzhin/ /las rnams dag ni thams

cad du/ /sngags pas mnyam par gzhag te bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang

ba'i mtshan rnams kyis legs par mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das mnyes par mdzad pa/ byang chub sems ni rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /dgra bcom 'dod chags bral ba dang / /legs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas mchog /

blo gros dag pa ye shes che/ /thams cad mkhyen pa kun rig mchog /mchog gi dbang phyug dpa' ba che/ /thog ma tha ma med khyab bdag /ma 'dres ma 'dres pa yi don/ /shin tu phra ba mchog sbyin rgyal/ /rdo rje can chen rnal 'byor che/ /rdo rje

rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog /mi bskyod pa dang mi zad mgon/ /chos dbyings gzhan dang gzhan min pa/ /rin chen 'byung gnas rdo rje mchog /dbang bskur kun gyi bla ma'i bla/ /theg chen che ba'i mchog gi mchog /dpa' bo mchog tu dpa'

ba'i mchog /zab cing yang la phra ba dang / /thams cad thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po che/ /tsha skyob dkar po stobs po che/ /gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid che/ /phul byung phul las phul du byung / /rgyu med

mchog gi mchog dpa' mchog /gzi mchog gzi brjid byed mtshungs pa/ /rgyal ba rgyal ba mchog nyid dang / /legs pa'i rgyal po bdag nyid che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems chen po/ /rdo rje rgyal po lcags kyu che/ /rdo rje chags pa mda'

chen po/ /rdo rje legs pa legs grub mdzad/ /rdo rje rin chen che mchog mchog /rdo rje gzi brjid legs brjid mdzad/ /rgyal mtshan chen po rin chen tog /rdo rje bzhad pa legs bzhad mdzad/ /'jig rten dbang phyug pad ma che/ /shes rab ye

shes legs rno mdzad/ /chos kyi 'khor lo chos chen po/ /sems dpa' smra ba legs bzhad mdzad/ /sna tshogs las ni rgyal po che/ /rdo rje bsrung ba legs bsrung mdzad/ /khro bo chen po gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje mtshams sbyor mtshams

sbyor sel/ /phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas kun khyod la/ /dang po'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog /legs so rdor can rnal 'byor che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dge/ snying po'i rgyan zhes mtshan gsol ba/ /'di dag thams

cad legs par gsungs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems/ /ye shes snying po shin tu mdzes/ /gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang / /sba bya shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdo/ /brjod du med cing yi

ge bral/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rgyas pa 'di yongs su rdzogs s+ho/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rjo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol

ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das ma yang snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po 'di skad ces nyid la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes rdo rje la zhugs par gyur to/ /zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi snying po shes rab ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar mdzad cing brtan par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs de las 'thon te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa ma

lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas sems can thams cad kyi 'ang shes rab dang ye shes rnam par sbyangs te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas bkug cing rjes su mnyes par byas nas

legs par mdzad nas rnam par gnas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin legs par yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas mngon par dbang bskur te gzi brjid dang / tog dang / bzhad pa dang / de dag la nges par sbyar te mchog gi dbang

phyug chen po las rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis chos rtogs pa la yang rab tu gnas nas rnon po dang / rgyu dang smra ba'i sems dpa' rnams la 'ang thugs brtan par mdzad de yongs su dag nas yang pad mo'i sems dpa'i ting nge

'dzin la rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid gzhi med pa la sbyar nas sna tshogs pa'i las kyi bdag po dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bsrung ba dang khro bo dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung

dang thugs rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba rnams sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongs su smin pa dang byin gyis brlabs te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar rjes su zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o zag med shes rab bdag /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/ /shes rab shin tu dri med sems/ /sems dpa'i lus su bdag gyur

to/ /dri med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad na/ /e ma'o chos ni bsam med nyid/ /bdag gi dbang du rnam par gnas/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon nas

byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug gi lus su mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yongs su bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye 'khor kun du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang byin

gyis brlabs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bstan pa'i

chos kyi tshig bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni legaso

legs so/ /legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas sngags kyi tshig 'di dag

bka' stsal pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam

par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su blta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la zad pa'i rjes su blta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do/ /

nang gi tshor ba dang phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems dang / nang gi chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su blta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang

ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su blta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la zad pa'i rjes su blta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la mi

gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do/ /rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyis gnas so/ /oM kA~M oM tsa twA ra smr-i t+yu ba s+w+pa nA nA hU~M/ yang dag

par spong ba bzhi ni sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dun pa skyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'dzin to/ /smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /

sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa la sogs pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do/ /'bad do brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'dzin to/ /smon lam yang dag

par 'debs so/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing rgyas par bya ba dang / yangs par bya ba'i phyir dang / bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu

'dzin to/ /smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /chos rnams thams cad don dam par mi spong ba dang / mi spong ba ma yin pa'i ched du rtogs par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'di bka' stsal to/ /

oM samyaka pra hA Na sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA sa ma tA ma d+hiSh+Tha aHraHhU~M/ yang dag par spong ba rjod pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul

gyi rkang pa sgom par byed do/ /brtson 'grus dang sems dang / spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi sgo'i chos thams cad sgyu ma

sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du 'jug go zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bas bka' stsal to/ /oM r-i d+hi bA da pA ra mi te la ba pa ra hU~M hU~M/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya ba shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /dbang po lnga ni dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la dbang sgyur ba

bas spros pa med pa'i dbang po 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /oM in dr-i yA ba b+ho d+ha pra dz+nye i sheny+tsa nA ma n+ya nA ya ga tA ya AHhU~M/ dbang po mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /stobs lnga ni dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus

kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs so zhes bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa stobs thams cad rtogs pa/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba/

gdod ma nas dag pas 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA ba la aHhU~M hU~M ba/ stobs 'phel ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi ni/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms so/ /

oM brah+ma bi hA rA d+hi Sh+ThA na ga~M ma~M dru k+Sha hU~M trU~M/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni spobs pa so so

yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bka' stsal to/ /oM pra ti sam+bi daHswa hU~M/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /rjes su dran pa drug gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang

gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa'o/ /chos thams cad gcig tu rjes su dran pa ni chos thams cad don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid med pa rnam par spyad pas mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ting nge

'dzin la dbang sgyur bas bka' stsal to/ /oM sar+b+ba a nu smr-i ti bud+d+ha~M sa~M pa dA di shi hU~M hU~M hU~M/ rjes su dran pa drug gi shes rab bo/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub

kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag

byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bka' stsal to/ /oM sar+b+ba tA sad+ha bo d+h+ya~M ga sa ma tA su pra tish+Thi te d+hu ba~M/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin

to/ /lam zad mi shes pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po la 'jug pa legs par so sor rig pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so/ /oM Ar+yA Sh+TA~M ga mArga ma Ta/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gsum ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / gsog dang gsob kyi rnam pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i

rnam pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces brjod do/ /de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ gang la mtshan mar mi byed pa dang / 'dod pa med pa dang

shes pa med pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / rnam par bral ba'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal

ba'i rnam pa sems rtse gcig pa ste de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /chos thams cad rtogs nas smon par mi byed do/ /lha 'am lha las gzhan gang yang rung ba don du mi gnyer zhing gsol ba 'debs par yang mi 'dod pa

ste/ dngos po thams cad la ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo yis kyang ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gsum nye bar rtogs par bya'o/ /oM kha sa mAHsar+b+ba d+har+m+mAHkha~M/ de la stobs bcu ni gnas dang

gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs

mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa so sor mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mngon par shes pa

lnga mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /oM da sha ba la sa ma tA thA/ stobs bcu

mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi

gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs

kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha'

mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes

mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched

las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par

'das te 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ /chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par

byang ba med pa/ bsam gtan med cing bsam gtan med pa ma yin pa snyoms par 'jug pa med cing snyoms par 'jug pa ma yin pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /oM sa man+ta b+ha dre sar+b+ba swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he d+ha~M Sha~M kha~M/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang bral ba zhes

bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge

sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan ci yang rung ste 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma

mthong bas de la bdag med pa thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig

rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas nas de la

zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa'am skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su 'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /gang yang bdag gis bar

chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la brten na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/ /gang yang bdag gi lam 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i lam du bshad pa de yis nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te yang dag par sdug bsngal

zad pa dang / yang dag par sdug bsngal mthar bya bar ga la 'gyur zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes

su mi mthong ba la sogs pa ji ltar gyur pa thams cad yongs su spros te brjod par bya'o/ /mi 'jigs pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid de ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /oM bai shA ra d+ya sa ma tA prAp+ta a

a a~M aHmthar gyis gnas pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi snyoms par 'dug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pas dben pa sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/

bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba

dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms su gnas te/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de

la dran pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid

bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med/ btang snyoms pa dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang

dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam

mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang

dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar

bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad po dang

mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob nas dngos por rtog par mi byed dngos po med par rtog par mi byed/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par rtogs so/ /'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mnyam pa nyid do/ /oM a

nan+taHbi mok+Sha mu khe shu~M/ dngos po thams cad mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / spros pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid

kyi don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pad ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ bstan pa'i rjes su

rtogs pa'i sbyor bas so/ /oM sar+b+ba pA ra mi ta aR+tha pa ri pU ra Ni oM brA~M hU~M ta~M/ thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la sa bcu po gang zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang /

'od byed pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / sbyang dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin zhes

bya ba dang / sa thams cad don gcig ste 'di ltar ye shes kyi don to/ /ye shes kyang ci yang med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa yi ge med pa don yod pa/ gdod ma nas dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ 'od gsal ba brjod pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to/ /oM b+hU mi bi sho d+ha ni

sar+b+bA rba pa ri pU ra Ni ba~M b+h+ru~M/ sa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa dang las dang po pa dang /

rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye ba nas skye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang / bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa

dor ba ste don dam par gnas pa gcig yin pa'i phyir te 'di ltar gnas pa med pa'o/ /oM sar+b+ba bya ba s+thA na bi ga ste hU~M/ rnam par gnas pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu gang zhe

na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba'o/ /dbang ba

dang mi dbang ba rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba thams cad la dbang ba dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rjes su thob pa/ chos thams cad legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /oM sar+b+ba ba shi te trA~M trU~M hU~M/ thams cad la dbang ba zhes bya

ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o/ /ca co mi mnga'o/ /dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi

mnga'o/ /'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o/ /ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o/ /'dun pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /dran pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /ting

nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /'das pa'i dus
la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug

go/ sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste

ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /'di chos rje sa skya pa'i bsgyur 'phro lags/ rgya dpe la gtugs shing slob dpon rab zhi bshes gnyen gyi 'grel pa dang yang bstun nas/ zhus dag byas shing / mi bcos su mi rung ba re re tsam 'grel

pa dang bstun nas bcos shing zhu thugs g.yar khral du blangs nas/ bu ston gyis bgyis pa'o/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la sa bcu rnams ci zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma

med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang /

chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba'o/ /sa rnams thams cad don gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi don no/ /ye shes kyang don dam par ci yang med pa nyon mongs pa med pa 'gyur ba med pa don yod pa gdod ma nas dag pa dri ma med pa 'od gsal ba

rjod du med pa'o zhes pa'i don gang yin pa'o/ /oM b+hU mi bi sho d+ha ni sarbAr+tha pa ri pU ra Ni ba~M b+h+ru~M/ sa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa bcu rnams ci zhe

na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang byis par gyur pa dang las dang po pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa dang skye ba skyed pa dang sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba

thob pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa ni don dam par na rnam par gzhag pa dang bral ba ste/ rnam par gzhag pa gcig nyid kyi phyir na 'di lta ste/ rnam par gzhag pa med

pa'o/ /oM sar+b+bA bya bas+thA na bi ga te hU~M/ rnam par gzhag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu rnams ci zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad

la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / stobs la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba'o/ /dbang rnams thams cad kyang don dam

par dbang med pa rang bzhin rnam par dben pa kun rdzob tu dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rjes su thob pa ste chos legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /oM sarbA ba shi te trA~M b+h+rU~M hU~M/ dbang thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad rnams ci zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang / tha

dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams

pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med cing rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa nyams pa med pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma

thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / gsung gi

phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni yul thams cad du

dus thams cad kyi tshe thams cad mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa ste/ stong pa nyid la yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir na shes rab yongs su dag pa'o/ /oM A we Ni ka bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma sa ma te AHbI ra hU~M kha~M/

ma 'dres pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// //de la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams ci zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los mtshan pa nyid de 'di'i phyag dang zhabs kyi

mthil dag la 'khor lo rtsibs stong can lte ba dang bcas pa mu khyud dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil legs par gnas pa ste/ zhabs kyi mthil thams cad kyis sa gzhi la reg

cing de yang 'di'i mtho ba ni dma' ba dang dma' ba ni mtho ba'o/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bur dra bas 'brel pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag dag dang zhabs de dag gser gyi mdog can gyi ri mo'i phreng ba

rnams kyis rkang pa brgyad pa bzhin du mdzes pa'o/ /phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i phyag dang zhabs dag ras bal 'jam po bzhin dang / skyes nas zla ba lon pa'i byis pa bzhin

du gzhon sha can dang / ka tsa lin da ltar 'jam pa reg na bde ba'o/ /bdun mtho bar gyur te phyag gnyis dag dang / zhabs gnyis dag dang / phrag gong dag dang / mgrin pa'i phyogs gcig go/ sor mo ring ba ste 'di'i zhabs kyi sor mo

rnams rim gyis ring ba nyid do/ /rting pa yangs pa ste 'di'i rting pa che zhing zhabs kyi rjes su 'tsham par yangs par 'gyur ro/ /sku che zhing drang ba nyid de 'phye bo ma yin zhing zhom pa ma yin/ ma tshang ba ma yin 'thas pa ma yin

legs par skyes pa rnam pa thams cad pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sku ste mtho ba 'di'i srid dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i zheng du 'gyur ro/ /zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid de 'di'i pus mo dang long bu mtho bar 'gyur ro/ /ba spu'i rtse mo gyen
du phyogs pa ste/ 'di'i ba spu rnams rtse mo gyen du phyogs par 'gyur zhing ba spu rnams g.yas phyogs su 'khyil la 'khor ba mig sman gyi mdog can rnams te/ de rnams kyis gser gyi

mdog can gyi sku mngon par gsal bar byed do/ /byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i lta bu ste bcom ldan 'das kyi byin pa dag zlum pa ri dgas e ne ya rnams kyi lta bu'o/ /phyag ring zhing mdzes pa ste rgyas shing ma btud pa nyid du phyag mthil

dag gis rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la reg pa'o/ /mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ste/ sbubs kyis rab tu g.yogs pa glang po che'i gsang gnas lta bur 'gyur ro/ /sku mdog gser 'dra ba ste/ 'di'i kha dog gser lta bur 'gyur ro/ /

lpags pa srab pa ste shin tu 'jam pa gser shog ltar 'jam pa'i lpags pa can du 'gyur zhing rdul med pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa'o/ /spu re re nas skyes pa ste/ 'di'i ba spu'i khung bur spu rnams re rer 'gyur ro/ /smin ma'i dbus na mdzod

spu can te 'di'i smin ma dag gi dbus na ras skud legs pa lta bu dung bcag pa'i kha dog can g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar 'gyur te/ mdzod spu nyid kyis zhal gser gyi kha dog lta bu shin tu gsal bar byed do/ /sku stod seng ge lta

bu ste/ 'di'i sku stod du yangs pa seng ge'i lta bur 'gyur ro/ /dpung mgo zlum pa ste yongs su zlum pa'i mgrin pa can du 'gyur ro/ /thal gong rgyas pa ste/ 'di'i nye bar rgyas par 'gyur zhing gser shog bzhin du rnam par gsal

ba'i mgrin pa can no/ /yan lag so so rnams su ro rnams myong bar byed do zhes pas na ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid de/ rtsa rnams yin la de rnams kyi mchog tu rlung dang / mkhris pa dang bad kan la sogs pa rnams kyis ma

dkrugs pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag par gsol ba'o/ /shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar mchu zheng gab pa ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mchu dang zheng dag mnyam pa'o/ /dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ dbu zlum par 'gyur zhing gtsug tor gdugs lta

bus yas bkab pa gtsug tor yang shin tu mtho ba'o/ /ljags ring ba ste snyan gyi mtha'i bar du ljags kyi rtse mos reg par byed cing / dbu skra'i mthar thug par yang / dpral ba'i mthar ljags kyis khebs pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs te 'khor

stong phrag du mar dbyangs nang du ji lta ba de ltar phyi rol du 'ang thos shing bya ka la ping ka'i bzhin du snyan pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /'gram pa seng ge'i lta bu ste/ 'gram pa dag seng ge'i bzhin du zlum por 'gyur ro/ /tshems dkar ba ste dung dang kun da dang /

zla ba'i kha dog can gyi tshems rnams so/ /tshems mnyam pa ste ha cang dma' ba ma yin mtho ba ma yin mi mnyam pa ma yin pa'i rtse mo can gyi tshems rnams su 'gyur ro/ /tshems thags bzang ba ste tshems rnams bar med pa'o/ /

tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste/ tshems 'og tu nyi shu dang / steng du tshems nyi shu'o/ /spyan mthon mthing ste spyan dag gi sngon po gang yin pa de shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur te ri mo dmar po rnams dang / ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir la/ gang dkar po yin

pa de dkar po kho na shin du rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /rdzi ma ba'i lta bu ste/ spyan gyi rdzi ma rnams khyu mchog gi bzhin du gang 'og ma yin pa de rnams 'og kho na dang / gang steng ma yin pa de rnams steng kho nar gnas pa ma 'dzings pa legs par gzhol

ba'o/ /sems can 'ga' zhig rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mdog can du mthong ba 'ga' zhig rnams kyis shel gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis pad ma rA ga'i kha dog dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis

in dra nI la'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis dung dang kun da dang zla ba ltar dkar ba dang / 'ga' zhig gis kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / 'ga' zhig gis nam mkha'i

kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig gis khru phyed dang bcu gsum pa'i tshad dang / ji srid du dpag tshad 'bum gyi tshad dam/ dpag tshad bye ba'i tshad dang / ji srid du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin mtha' yas pa rnams su snang bar

mdzad pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dang / ji srid du me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgya mtsho rnams snang bar

byed cing / chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gdul bya'i dbang las thams cad snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbyangs kyis rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang /

stong gnyis dang gsum dang / ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i bar thams cad 'od dang / dbyangs kyis snang bar byas nas rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / chos dang zang zing dang don mthun pa dang don bya ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos

po bzhi rnams kyis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs shing / phan btags nas byang chub chen po la rab tu dgod par mdzad do/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnyam pa nyid kyis chos rnams thams cad mnyam

zhing mnyam pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan mngon par 'grub par blta bar bya'i mtshan ma yin pa mngon par 'grub pa ni ma yin no/ /byang chub mtshan nyid med pa nyid kyi phyir chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med

pa ste/ 'di lta ste stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mnyam pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub dang / chos rnams thams cad kyang mtshan nyid gcig pa

ste/ 'di lta ste nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can/ zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can rnams so zhes pa'o/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ba ra lak+Sha Na sa ma tA d+har+m+ma te oM mtshan thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// //dpe byad brgyad cu rnams ci zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sen mo zangs gyi mdog lta bur 'gyur te/ sen mo snum pa dang / sen mo mtho ba dang / sen mo

rnams zlum par gyur pa dang / sor mo rnams rim gyis phra ba dang / sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / rtsa rnams mdud pa med pa dang / long bu mi mngon pa dang / zhabs mi mnyam pa med par mtshungs pa dang / glang po che'i stabs su

gshegs pa dang / seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / g.yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa dang / drang por gshegs pa dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang / rim gyis gshegs pa dang / che zhing yangs la yongs su gyur pa'i pus mo'i lha nga can dang / mtshan yongs su

rdzogs pa dang / gom pa snyoms pa dang / sku rnam par dag pa dang / sku 'jam pa dang / sku rnam par dang ba dang / sku zhum pa med pa dang / sku rgu ba med pa dang / kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba dang / khyu mchog ltar kun nas rab tu dang ba can dang / gzigs

pa yongs su dag cing mngon par 'dod pa la mnyam pa'i 'od can dang / sku zlum pa dang / sku skabs phyin pa dang / sku ma rnyongs pa dang / sku rked gzhu'i lag cangs lta bu dang / lte ba zab pa dang / lte ba mi yo ba dang / lte ba g.yas phyogs su

'khyil ba dang / lte ba thogs pa med pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa dang / lpa gas pa skyon dang bral ba dang / gnag bag dang sme ba med pa dang / sku brtan pa dang phyag shing bal lta bu dang / phyag yangs pa dang / phyag

gi ri mo snum pa dang / phyag gi ri mo mi yo ba dang / mchu bim pa lta bu dang / zhal ha cang mi ring ba dang / mnyen zhing srab la dmar ba'i ljags dang / glang po che'i nga ro can dang / snyan cing mnyen pa'i dbyangs dang / sgra phun sum tshogs pa

dang dbyangs 'jam pa dang / shangs mtho ba dang / mche ba zlum pa dang / mche ba dkar ba dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang / spyan gtsang ba dang / spyan yangs pa dang / spyan mthon mthing dang / rdzi ma gnag pa dang / smin ma stug pa dang / smin

ma 'jam pa dang / spyan dkar gnag 'byes shing pad ma'i 'dab ma lta bu dang / smin tshugs ring ba dang / smin ma'i spu nag pa dang / smin ma'i spu phra ba dang / smin ma rjes su mthun pa dang / kha dog ma nyams pa dang / snyan mi mnyam

pa med pa dang / snyan skyon dang bral ba dang / dbang po thams cad ma nyams shing skyon dang bral ba dang / yongs su rdzogs shing mtho la mchog tu gnas pa'i zhal gdong dang / dpral ba can dang / dbu shin tu rgyas pa dang / dbu skra

gnag pa dang / dbu skra stug pa dang / dbu skra 'jam pa dang / dbu skra dri zhim pa dang / dbu skra mnyam pa dang / dbu skra snum pa dang / dbu skra ma 'khums pa dang / dbu skra ma 'khrugs pa dang / dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang g.yung

drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa dang / rgyal mtshan yang dag par gnas pa dang / dpral ba dung lta bu dang / dbu mchog tu mtho ba dang / gtsug tor yar 'phags pa dang / dbu gdugs kyi rnam pa can dang kun nas mdzes pa ste/ de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i dpe byad can mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa gsal byed dang gsal byed ma yin pa mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad gsal byed med par

mnyam pa nyid la rab tu legs par gnas pa mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad sgyu ma'i chos dang ldan pa la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ dus gsum gyi dpe byad mnyam pa nyid/ rdo rje lta bu mnyam pa nyid thob pa stong pa nyid kyi chos thams

cad dang dpe byad mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ gnyis su med pa'i don la legs par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams so zhes pa'o/ /oM a nu byeny+dza na sa ma ta su pra ti Sh+Thi ta badzra dz+nyA na hU~M la~M a~M/ dpe byad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po can la legs so zhes bya ba rnams kyis mnyes

par mdzad do/ /oM byang chub sems ched khyod legs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchog /sangs rgyas chos ched khyod legs so/ /ting 'dzin dbang du 'jug pa yi/ /rdo rje ye shes khyod legs so/ /rdo rje sems ched khyod

legs so/ /tshad med ched du khyod legs so/ /shes rab dam pa'i ched du yang / /mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad/ /sangs rgyas snga mas ma gsungs pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams

thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba bzhi yis mngon par dgyes par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kun khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /chos kyi sku yi mchog gi mchog /gdod ma'i sngags kyi don nyid la/ /rdo rje ye shes stobs chen la/ /shin tu sgrib med zhi

ba la/ /rdo rje chos rnams legs gnas pa/ /theg pa chen po'i go 'phang thob/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi lha/ /gdod nas dag pa dpa' bo che/ /dbang phyug dam pa mchog gi mchog /dam chos mchog tu 'gyur ba med/ /bde gshegs

de rnams la phyag 'tshal zhes pa'o/ /na ma stu te/ oM ma~M hU~M hU~M na mo stu te swA hA/ 'di ni brjod pa tsam zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o/ /zhes pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus pa mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid kyis rigs thams cad 'khor lo bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de

de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gsol ba btab pa'i gsung gis de ma thag kho nar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bos te bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams

cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po nyon cig ces te/ de nas 'di las yang dag bshad/ /byang chub dkyil 'khor bla na med/ /rdo rje ye shes gsang ba mchog /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi'o/ /dben pa'i sa gzhi nyams

dga' ba/ /me tog phreng bas rnam brgyan pa/ /kun tu sna tshogs cha bzang ba/ /kun tu sna tshogs sdom par ni/ /kun nas sna tshogs bya ba rnams/ /dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ /ri yi mchog gam grong khyer ni/ /me tog 'bras

bus rnam brgyan pa/ /der gnas sngags pas dngos grub mchog /gal te 'dod na yang dag bri/ /gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa'i gnas/ /ri stengs rnams su kun nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bya ba rnams/ /dam pa'i don du bsgrub

par bya/ /ma mo'i gnas dang zhi ba'i gnas/ /dur khrod lha yi gnas su ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin dpal bya ba rnams/ /don dam par ni bsgrub par bya/ /pad ma'i skyed mos tshal kun dang / /chu bo 'dus pa rnams su yang / /phyag na pad ma

dpal bya ba/ /dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ /rgyal po'i pho brang nyams dga' dang / /rgyal po'i skyed tshal rnams su ni/ /rdo rje rin chen de yi ni/ /rin chen bya ba rnams bsgrub bya/ /rtags gcig pa dang ba glang gnas/ /chu klung

'dus pa rnams su yang / /sna tshogs bya ba thams cad rnams/ /dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /lha rnams gnas mchog kun tu'o/ /nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /gang du mnyam

par gzhag pa der/ /rtag pa bsod nams mchog gyur pa/ /bya ba thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /phyogs kun mnyam nyid gnas dkyil 'khor/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya/ /shar lho nub dang byang rnams kyi/ /phyogs su

dkyil 'khor thig brgyad po/ /de yi phyi ru 'khor lo ni/ /kha dog lnga pa cher 'bar ba'o/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis mdzes pa ste/ /sna tshogs gos dang me tog phreng / /rnga yab sogs kyis rnam

brgyan pa/ /dkyil 'khor kun la gnas pa yi/ /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /gal te dngos grub

mchog 'dod na/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bri bar bya/ /shar du bcom ldan 'khor lo can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag ldan/ /'khor los sgyur ba thams cad ni/ /sgeg par bcas pa kun bri bya/ /

lho ru gtsug tor dkar po ni/ /rin chen 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ /gtsug tor dkar po'i ngos su ni/ /rdo rje gzi brjid la sogs bri/ /byang du brtson 'grus chen po ni/ /gzi brjid phung po stobs po che/ /sna tshogs rdo rje sogs bcas pa/ /rim

pa kun nas bri bar bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyis ni/ /dbang phyug mgon po'i nub phyogs su/ /gtsug tor rgyal ba brtson 'grus che/ /rdo rje chos sogs dang bcas pa/ /thams cad sngags pas bri bar bya/ /gal te dngos grub

mchog 'dod na'o/ /dbang ldan phyogs su 'phags pa gnas/ /me mtshams su ni cher 'phags so/ /bden bral du ni rnam rgyal nyid/ /rlung du de bzhin rnam 'phro ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /sems dpa' kun gyi
mdun du ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /gsal zhing 'bar 'khrigs 'od zer can/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor rnams su ni/ /mchod pa rnams ni gzhag byas te/ /sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che/ /de bzhin

gzugs sgra la sogs dang / /bdug pa la sogs gsang chen no/ /sgo skyong ba ni bzhi yin te/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su/ /kun tu bzang po sogs rnams bri/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bri bya ste/ /mchod pa byas nas snga ma

bzhin/ /de bzhin 'jug pa sogs byas la/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni brtsam par bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sogs/ /dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong ba las/ /snga ma rtag pa ji bzhin du/ /phyi nas de bzhin bri bar

bya/ /bsod nams ji bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams/ /thams cad mtshon gyis rab brtags pa/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha ngo bos/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri byar 'gyur/ /rang lha'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor gyis/ /dkyil 'khor thams

cad rab tu grub/ /cho ga dman dang lhag pas kyang / /'grub par 'gyur te skyon ma min/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang ba/ /kun nas sna tshogs 'khor lo can/ /'khor los sgyur ba bdag nyid che/ /rin chen bdun gyi mchod pa

che/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba ltar/ /dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi 'byung shes bya/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni bshad byas pa'o/ /phyag na pad ma bdag nyid che'i/ /pad ma'i rnam par rtag shes bya/ /rin po che

yi rin chen rnams/ /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rnam pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor dman zhing dam tshig rnams/ /dor bar byas pa de nyid ni/ /gsang ba shes pa ma yin na/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /

dkyil 'khor thams cad lta ba ni/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /gdon mi za bar rtag tu bya/ /bla ma la ni yon phul nas/ /rjes su rim pas bsgrub par bya/ /brtan pa 'am ni g.yo ba yi/ /rdzas rnams ji snyed thams cad de/ /rtsa ba

me tog 'bras bu sogs/ /bu mo legs par brgyan byas dang / /'dod pa'i chung ma phul byas nas/ /slar yang rin gyis bslu bar bya/ /grong dang de bzhin gtsug lag khang / /kun dga' ra sogs rgyal srid mchog /gang la sbyin bya cung

zad yod/ /'tsho ba de ni sbyin par bya/ /bdag gi dngos po yongs gtong ba/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o/ /bla ma la ni yon phul nas/ /gsang ba dam pa rmad byung ba/ /mngon par dbang bskur de nas bya/ /'dab ma brgyad pa

yid 'ong la/ /slob ma gzhag nas yan lag kun/ /phyag rgya kun nas bcings byas nas/ /khams kun rang bzhin rtsa ba dang / /sa bon 'bras bus dud pa yi/ /bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur te/ /sangs rgyas phreng ba'i dbang bskur las/ /

spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang / /gzhog dang de bzhin rgyab tu yang / /sangs rgyas rin chen chen po kun/ /cod pan mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu/ /gdugs dkar steng na gnas pa'o/ /rgyal srid kun gyi

dbang bskur gyis/ /yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya/ /dpal kun gyis ni mngon mtho ba/ /zhes bya'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o/ /khams kun rang bzhin glang po dang / /rta ni mchog tu 'bar ba 'am/ /seng ge'i gdan gnas dbang bskur ba/ /dpal gyi sngags

ni rjod byed cing / /dpal gyis mngon mtho zhes bya ba'i/ /dam pa'i don gyi dbang bskur ba/ /bkra shis sam ni dpal be'u/ /gang yang bris nas dbang bskur bya/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis/ /rnam rgyal dbang bskur zhes bshad do/ /tsan dan chu dang bum pa

che/ /gzhan gyis mi thub sman blugs pa/ /kun nas dbang bskur ched du ni/ /rtag tu shes rab can gyis brtag /gzhan gyis mi thub dbang bskur mchog /dkyil 'khor gang gang bris byas nas/ /phyag rgya gang dang gang bkod pa/ /der ni de dang de brtag bya/ /de rnams phyag rgya

dam par bshad/ /dbang bskur ched du sangs rgyas rnams/ /lha de rnams ni yid du 'ong / /sman gyi dam pa mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bshad/ /tsan dan dang ni rgya spos dang / /ga pur de bzhin gur gum dang / /a ka ru dang lha yi shing / /tsan dan dmar

po nyid dang ni/ /si~M hA byA+ai g+h+ri de bzhin mchog /kun nas sa ha de ba dang / /gi ri kar Na tshangs mchod sbyin/ /sman gyi dam pa rnams su bshad/ /lhag gnas kun gyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa rab 'jug cing / /dang po rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ /shes rab thams

cad rab 'jug byed/ /rin chen dam pa'i dam pa ni/ /gser la sogs kyis thams cad nas/ /sman kun dang ni sa bon kun/ /'bru rnams thams cad bzang po ni/ /sangs rgyas byin brlabs rnal 'byor las/ /dbang bskur don du rab brtag bya/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che/ /dbang bskur dam pa 'od 'bar ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun nas sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes pa'o/ /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud du ji ltar rnyed pa yongs su rdzogs so// //rigs gzugs skal bzangs mang thos blo

'byor sogs/ /phun tshogs ldan pa dpal ldan chos rje yis/ /rgyud 'di bsgyur las cung zad ma rdzogs pa/ /dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas rdzogs par bsgyur/ ye d+har+m+mA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba da ta te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA sha ma NaH

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pany+tsa bing sha ti ka pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA mu kha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sgo ny-i shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'-i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa/ dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab ky-i zom la lha thams cad kyi mtshan mo'-i gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/

de nas bcom ldan 'das lha dang / lha'i bu dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' ld-ing dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi 'am ci dang / srin po dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / log 'dren dang / sha za dang / snang ba dang / mi snang

ba'i ma mo'-i tshogs shin du mang zhing rgya che ba dpag tshad lnga'i dky-il 'khor du 'dus pa sha stag dang / dge slong stong ny-is brgya lnga bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje

rdo rje'i r-igs thams cad ky-is yongs su bskor/ rig pa'i tshogs dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad dang / r-ig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bar snang las babs nas bcom

ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba

pa'i bdag po nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di dag ni nga'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo yin no/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /

oM kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM 'gog pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM skye bar 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol du

phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM rnam par shes pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM 'bar ba chen po'-i chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM brtson 'grus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM thams cad du

'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM rdo rje thams cad brtan pa'i sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i

chos nyid ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM las rnam par sbyong ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can phaT shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM 'dod pa la 'dod

chags rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM mgyogs pa'i rdo rje can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM hU~M thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM hr-IHshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i

sgo'o/ /oM a zhes bya ba'-i sgo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'-i sgo'o/ /oM shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM am ba hU~M shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM oM shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'-i sgo'o/ /oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ky-i gsung rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol

du phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs

te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// //skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ /

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya gu h+ya ma Ni ti la ka nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gsang ba nor bu thig le zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi rdul rnyog pa med pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag

gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

rin po che'i cod pan khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs par khong du chud pas las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams

kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad rtag pa dus gsum gyi dam tshig la rnam par gnas pa'i sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsten cing bstod pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i rtse mo khang pa brtsegs pa/ kha dog rnam par bkra ba'i dril bu dang ldan pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar gyi ba dan dang / me tog gi chun po dang /

dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / zla bas nye bar mdzes pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i khang bzangs na bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'

lag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang ldan pas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / bdud kyi stobs thams

cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin

gshegs pa gzhal du med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu ltar 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su gang bar mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las kyang gzhal du

med cing grangs las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing mthong bar gyur cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na yang chos kyi tshul 'di nyid ston par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nam mkha'i khams

thams cad la sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rtag tu bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bgrod pa'i rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings

thams cad kyi rdul rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po nam mkha' khams thams cad la 'phro ba'i rang bzhin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par yongs su mkhyen pa/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag gi rang bzhin dag pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa nam mkha' thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad legs par gzigs pa'i ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can

gyi khams 'dul ba'i spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i ye shes mdzad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i thugs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam

tshig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi legs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che chen pos dbang bskur ba'i rin po che dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rin po che'i tog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad gad chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi dag pa chen po'i chos dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

rdo rje'i gsung chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las sna tshogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsrung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su skyong ba'i rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dgongs pa phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes dang ldan pa ste/ kun tu bzang dang don yod pa/ /'chi med rab tu dga' ba'i gtso/ /nam mkha'i snying po gzi brjid che/ /rin chen

tog ste cher 'dzum pa/ /spyan ras gzigs dang dbang phyug che/ /'jam dpal kun gyi snying po dang / /brjod bral sna tshogs pa yi las/ /dpa' bo gtum po dam por 'dzin/ /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' tshim pa/ /rin chen nyi ma

rgyal mtshan 'dzum/ /chos mdzod mdzes pa'i 'khor lo gsung / /las dang chos dang 'jigs byed 'dzin/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /ma rungs khro dang bzod pa che/ /gnod sbyin srin po dam pa brtan/ /gzi chen dpa' bo
khyab bdag che/ /u ma'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon/ /'jug sreg rgyal 'dod thub pa che/ /'jig rten skyong dang mkha' dang sa/ /'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa/ /'byung chen sems can don rab mdzad/ /
thams cad sems can pha chen po/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das dang brtag /yang dag mtsho dang mchod chen po/ /sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che/ /srid pa gsum po'ang de yin no/ /de dag la sogs pa'i yon
tan bye ba brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor te dkyil 'khor chen po de la bzhugs nas chos ston par mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub

sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te 'khod nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i bcom ldan 'das mchog tu

gsang ba chen po'i thig le zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par bka' stsal du gsol/ gang gis sems can rnams la gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig de bdag gis bshad par bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i dam pa gang gis sems can thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de bshad par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po gang gis

bdag gsang ba'i bdag por 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad mi phyed par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad dang mi phyed par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid la ched du brjod pa

'dis ched du brjod pa/ e ma'o bdag ni thabs chen po/ /rab tu gsang ba thig le yi/ /ting 'dzin gang phyir grub pa yang / /gsang ba nyid ni zhu bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po bcom ldan 'das
kyi thugs ka nas 'thon nas phyag tu 'khod par gyur pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rab tu gsang ba'i thig le zhes bgyi ba ci lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje rab tu gsang ba'i thig le 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba'o/ /ches shin tu gsang ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad bskyed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid sbyin pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba rjes su rig pa'i don du de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su byon pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum mo/ /'di ni gsang ba'i mdzod do/ /'di nyid pad ma'o/ /'di nyid rdo rje'o/ /'di nyid dam

tshig ste/ de nyid kyis na lag na rdo rje/ dam tshig mi shes pa'i mdun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /de'i phyir lag na rdo rje ngas 'ga' la yang ma bshad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes slar yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir gang 'ga' zhig la smra bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ legs so rdo rje

sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /legs so rdo rje chos khyod kyis/ /rdo rje las khyod rab legs so/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg

pa chen po mdor bsdus pa/ /dag pas rnam par bsgrubs tsam gyis/ /bde blag tu ni sangs rgyas thob/ /bde ba zad med mi zad pa/ /skye ba 'di la 'grub par byed ces so/ /lag na rdo rje des na shin tu gsang ba'i thig le las kyang

mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di legs par sba bar bya'o/ /sems can gang kha cig nye bar skrag pa dang bcas pa yod la/ gang kha cig dad pa dang ldan pas theg pa chen po glang po che'i phrag tu zhon pa

dag yod do/ /de dag las dang po la ni gsang sngags dang phyag rgya dang gsang ba thams cad bshad par mi bya zhing gsang ba thams cad bstan par mi bya'o/ /dad pa can dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa dag la de dag thams cad bshad par bya'o/ /

legs par gsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thig le 'di ni ches shin tu gsang ba rab tu gnas pa'i slob dpon la bshad par bya'o/ /gang zhig rgyud 'di bshad pa tsam na sems can dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / gang dag ches shin tu dga' ba skye ba

de dag ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan par shes par bya'o/ /de dag la 'bad pas gdams pa dang bcas pa bstan par bya'o/ /sems can gang kha cig nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa de dag la lo rgyus tsam yang mi bya'o/ /de nas

byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir de dag la lo rgyus tsam yang mi bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag

pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje nyon cig /sems can de dag gis lha'i ris ma mthong zhing dam tshig la rab tu smod par byed pa de dag la gal te smras na/ lo rgyus tsam gyis kyang dmyal bar rab tu

ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rdo rje kun nas 'bar rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa 'dis rigs thams cad sreg

par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das de dag ni tshul bzhin ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par bgyi'o zhes so/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

'das bdag gis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag gi nang du bshad par mi bgyi lags na/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis shin tu ches gsang ba'i thig le zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i snying po dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dam tshig

ji srid bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad bskyed pa'i don du bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos spro ba'i sbyor ba'i dpa' bo'i ting

nge 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad gcig tu mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan

'dren pa dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par du ma la mnyam par bzhag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig ma lus shing lus pa med pa sems can gyi khams thams cad 'gugs

pa bde ba dang yid bde ba bskyed pa'i don du ji srid ting nge 'dzin dam pa 'grub pa'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ so so'i sgrub pa'i thabs rgya che bas mdor bsdus te cho ga

rgyas par gyur pa ni lag na rdo rje dang po re shig sngags pas lag pa gnyis a'i rnam pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsam par bya'o/ /a'i rnam pa de dri ma med pa'i gzugs la dkar ba bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin can te/ de nyid

yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje lho phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir lag pa gnyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du blta bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa

grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ 'dir lag pa gnyis zla ba la rdo rje phra mo nas kyi tshad tsam dkar po 'od zer dang ldan pa sngags 'dis bsgom

par bya ste/ hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ rdo rje des ci zhig bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen

pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje nyon cig /rdo rje thal mo dam du bcings nas gsang sngags 'dis rang gi spyi bor dgrol bar bya'o/ /oM swa b+hA ba bi shud d+hAH sar+b+ba d+har+m+mAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ de nas bdag

nyid shel dag pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med cing gsal ba'i gzugs su sngags pas bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas sdom pa gzung ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming che ge mo

zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid snying po byang chub la thug gi bar du ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /tshul

khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /so sor brtan par bdag gis gzung / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /

sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i/ /sdom pa deng nas brtan par gzung / /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /de nyid so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /sbyin pa

rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /nyin re bzhin ni dus drug tu/ /rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor gyi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba'o/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg pa
gsum/ /dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /de nyid so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus pas/ /las kyi rigs mchog

chen po yi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa rab tu bskyed pa dang / /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / /ma bsgral ba rnams bdag gis bsgral/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing / /sems

can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' lag na rjo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sdom pa bzung ste phyag rgya chen po

la gnas nas sngags pas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o/ /'di dag thams cad phyi rol dang nang du rtog pas brtags pa las gzhan 'ga' yang mi gnas so zhes de ltar snying la gzhag ste 'di skad ces 'du byed

thams cad ni mi rtag cing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal la gdod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid do zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod de

bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ji ltar bsgom par bgyi ba cung zad bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam

par snang mdzad chen pos sems so sor rig pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje khyod kyis sems rang bzhin gyis 'od

gsal ba de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'i bdag nyid nam mkha'i dkyil ma lus pa khyab pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mdzes pa/ dpag tshad brgya stong las lhag pa/ a la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i yi ge/ a A/ i I/ u U/

rI r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ a~M aH zhes bya ba de dag yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par

bsgoms pas bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod de don yod grub pa'i gzugs su gnas so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar 'khod de ched du brjod

pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /thog med grub pa'i don yod bdag /ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ /bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab

kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i zla ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu rgyas pa'i tshad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyi thugs kar zhugs par mdzad do/ /zhugs nas

kyang gcig tu mi phyed par gyur te/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'i tshul du rnam par gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje byang chub kyi zla ba de bshad par bya'o/ /zla ba de'i steng du bdag nyid byang chub

kyi zla ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya ste shin tu dri ma med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'i mchog /gnas ngan len thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams

cad myong ba'i don dang / ji srid nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i dri ma med pa sngon mthong ba'i zla ba lta bu ka la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'jug pa ste/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/
ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ a la~M k+ShaH ka la sogs pa'i yi ge 'di dag skar ma la sogs pa'i gzugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu mi phyed par gyur pa las zla ba'i

dkyil 'khor nyid du bsam par bya'o/ /yang lag na rdo rje zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de la nam mkha'i khams thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'i tshad kyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa zhi ba/ 'od zer dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag

po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje de ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems

dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gcig tu mdzad nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje rdo rje de sems dpa' rdo rje'i gzugs su bsgom par

bya ste/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'i tshad kyi rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par klubs pa/ lus thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyis gang zhing dang ba/ lag pa g.yon

pas dril bu 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa'i lag pas rdo rje snying gar brten pa zhal cung zad bzhad par sngags pas bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sngags ni 'di yin te/

oM badzra Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas sems dpa' rdo rje'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur sngags pas sngags 'dis bsgom par bya ste/ oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA

ga tA sta thA a ha~M/ de nas su~M gyi yi ge las sngags pas ri rab bsams la steng dang 'og gi sgor su~M dgod par bya'o/ /de nas hU~M gi yi ge las khang pa brtsegs pa bsam par bya ste/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag

ldan/ /kha dog sna tshogs dag dang bcas/ /sna tshogs ka bas nye bar mdzes/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras/ /zla ba zla ba phyed pas spud/ /nor bu dang mu tig gi phreng bas nye bar mdzes pa/ rin po che'i rgyan du ma dang /

dar dang / 'phan dang / me tog gi chun pos nye bar spud pa/ de dag la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa sngags pas bsam par bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du byas te/

slar yang bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa bsgoms te/ de nas hU~M gi yi ge de nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i

lus kyi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge bkod de rdo rje sems dpa' dang yi ge de dag yongs su son pa las rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa zhi zhing dkar ba bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'

chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje de ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/

rdo rje de yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sna tshogs rdo rje khums lags so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig /rdo rje de nyid 'od zer dang

bcas/ snyems pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs cung zad bzhad pa'i zhal ras dang phyag gnyis rdo rje gsor bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ steng na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

bdag por bzhugs pa/ dpral ba dang nye bar mi bskyod pa/ g.yas su rin chen 'byung ldan/ rgyab tu 'od dpag tu med pa/ g.yon pa'i drung du don yod grub pa can/ de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par dang ldan pa rdo rje sems

dpa'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes de lta bu'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su bskyed nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su mthong lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag

na rdo rje la legs so zhes gnang ba/ legs so rdo rje sems dpa' po/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /legs so rdo rje chos khyod kyi/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'o/ /zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

lag na rdo rje khyod la thams cad bshad par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas brkyang ste sngags 'dis lag na rdo rje dbab pa bskyed par bya'o/ /oM badzra A be shA A bA+e sha aH A be a de nas rdo rje dbab pa skyed nas sems dpa' rdo rje bcings la

dam tshig bsgrag par bya ste/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas dam tshig byin la yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya ste/ oM tiSh+Tha badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ shA shwa to me b+ha wa/ hr-i da yaM me a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ sar+b+ba sid d+hi m+me pra

ya ts+tsha/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma su tsa me tsi t+ta~M shre yaH ku ru hU~M ha ha ha ha hoH b+ha ga wA~M sarba ta thA ga to badzra mA me muny+tsa badzrI b+hA wa badzra sa twa AH de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje me tog spyi bor sngags 'dis gzhag par bya ste/ pra tI ts+tsha badzra ho/ sngags pas
