par gyur to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo mtha' yas shing rab 'byam rgya che ba bstan par bya ba de dag gang zhe na/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi ga te pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yo a pra ti ha ta shA sa ne b+h+yaH ma hA kr-i pe b+h+yaH

ga ga na a ma la rU pa d+hA ra NI ta thA rU pa bi b+ha ba bi b+ha ba ni/ pa ra rU pa d+ha re ma hA kr-i le bi ma le sar+b+ba ga te bi sho d+ha ni/ de la 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig mnyam pa med pa yin no/ /a ma hA bi sma ye hU~M kha~M/ phyag na rdo rje 'di ni nam

mkha' ltar dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum yin no/ /

rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gang na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di mi 'chad cing mi brjod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ngas ma mthong ngo / /gsang ba pa'i bdag po rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar gsang ba'i snying po'i

dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang dam tshig 'di la 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas/ gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa'i rgyal po 'di

la mngon par brtson par bya'o zhes bya bar rig par bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang

chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin ci ltar ston chos thams cad la dbang thob pa'i bar du ci ltar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po

phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas slob dpon las dbang nod par bya'o/ /'di snyam du

slob dpon 'di ni bdag gi ston pa ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bskul ba'o snyam du yang sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de de nas thal mo sbyar te nye bar song la gsol ba gdab po/ /slob dpon

gyis kyang de don du gnyer bar shes nas snying rje chen po mngon sum du byas te tshig 'di skad ces smra bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu longs de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bla na med pa de khyod la bstan par bya'o/ /de nas sa
gzhi yid du 'ong ba brtags la cho ga snga mas sa gzhi sbyangs te dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la sgo gcig pa lha rnam par dbye ba'i gnas legs par brtags pa/ mchod pa'i gnas rnam pa sna tshogs bkod pa bsgrubs

pa spos chu dri zhim pos bkang ba'i bum pa dbus su bzhag pa bris la slob ma pad ma'i steng na 'dug pa rang gi lha'i gzugs bdag yin par dmigs pa la gnas pa yid byang chub kyi sems su gyur pa 'gro ba mtha'
dag yongs su bskyab pa'i bsam pa can de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag bum pa des spyi bo nas dbang bskur ro/ /'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes so/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan phye'o zhes kyang smra bar bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis lha'i gzugs ni
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci snyed pa'am sems dpa' mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi cha lugs kyi bye brag kyang rung ste gsang sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa las 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /gsang

ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa yang ci lta bu yin zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la dbang bskur ba'i tshe slob dpon gyis pad ma'i phyag rgyas gdan sra zhing brtan pa bsam gyis

mi khyab pa rdo rje ltar mi shigs pa yongs su brtag pa ni gser ram zangs sam 'jim pa las byas pa 'am ri mor bris pa gzhag ste bya'o/ /de'i steng na 'dug pa la chos thams cad la dbang thob par bya ba'i

phyir/ spos chu dri zhim pos bkang ba'i bum pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /slob dpon bdag nyid kyang ci ltar rjes su mthun par mos par bya ba 'am de'i phyag rgyas rjes su mthun pa'i bya ba bya'o/ /chos

kyi dung gi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /ral gri'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba mtha' dag

gzhom par byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang

gsang sngags kyis ni mi shes pa'i grong khyer gzhig par byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis ni spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /mdzod spu'i phyag

rgya dang gsang sngags kyis ni mdzod spu dang ldan par byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /yan lag thams cad byung ba'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis ni yan lag thams cad byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i

bdag po de la pad ma'i phyag rgya 'byung ste/ lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la 'khrig ma nas bgyed de sor mo thams cad mgo mnyam par brkyang ngo / /phyag rgya 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gdan yin te

dam pa mthu chen po'o/ /gsang sngags ni ngo mtshar che ba thams cad kyi sgo ste/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ ga ga nA ma la pra b+hA badzrA b+he bya nA ma hA kr-i pAd ma kaH de la 'di dag ni rdo rje'i tshig mnyam pa med pa'o/ /a ti

bisma ya ma hA kr-i pad ma dzaHhU~M/ lag pa gnyis bsnol te rgyab sbyar la sor mo rnams phan tshun blas pa'i tshul du bsnol te g.yon pa'i mthe bo rgyab tu bzlog la g.yas pa'i mthe bos sen mo la sbyar ro/ /rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste/ /

chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su sgrags/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyis/ /'khor lo dam pa 'di bskor ro/ /na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ ta thA ga ta a mr-i te bi dza ya bar Na na sar+b+ba dza ya ga ta d+har+tha kA ri ma hA kra be haM tra hi ma hAd b+hU te hU~M/

gsang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bo gnyis lag mthil du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis kyis rtsa ba dkris te lhag ma rnams so na gzhag la bsgreng ngo / /'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyis/ /phyag rgya sems can thams cad

kyi/ /don rnams rtag tu myur byed 'di/ /chos kyi dung zhes rnam par grags/ /na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ t+r+ya da d+h+wa b+ha ga ba ti pra tiSh+ThA nan/ a nan ta ru sa ra bi nir g+ho Sha~M ta thA ga ta bAka pra sa ra bisma ya ka d+ha ra ma hA d+ha ra ma hA d+ha ra

maSh+ka sar+b+ba sa twa san to sha nA rA ma hA ma hA hU~M/ gang ba'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug te mthe bo'i sen mo'i steng du ral gri'i tshul du gzung ngo / /phyag rgya rab tu mthu chen 'di/ /ral gri'i phyag rgyar rnam par grags/ /

sems can kun gyi 'jig tshogs lta/ /lhan cig skyes pa 'ang gcod pa yin/ /na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ a ma hA kha Da ga pradz+nyA ti dzi ta sad kA ya tri Sh+Ti ts+tshin+da na kA ra ta thA ga tA d+hi muka ti nir dzA ta bi d+hu ta sa~M kalpa ma hA ma hA

hU~M dza/ phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phyi rol du brkyang ste gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum par nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par bzung la/ rdo rje lta bur byas te mthe bo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du

gzhug go/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po yi/ /phyag rgya rab tu bsgrags pa 'di/ /mi shes grong khyer 'jig pa yi/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyar rnam par grags/ /de'i gsang sngags ni/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ ma hA

bim+ma ya te dzod b+hA ma hA tsaN+Da dur dan tA tra b+hany+dza hA/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi ngos su gtsug tor lta bur gzung ngo / /'di ni gtsug tor phyag rgya ste/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob

pa yin/ /gang gis phyag rgya 'di bcings pa/ /de la 'di ni gtsug tor 'gyur/ /de'i gsang sngags ni/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ sar+b+ba tra a pra ti ha ta b+hA ba ti d+har+m+ma hA ba li nAn/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta no du d+har+ya ba sha ya/

ma hA bud+hA sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+ThA te s+phu ra ma hA ma hoSh+NI Sha swA hA/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la smyin mtshams su gzung ngo / /rgya 'di rgyal ba mchog rnams kyi/ /mdzod spur rtag tu rnam par bsgrags/ /

de'i sngags ni/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ a sha khan du ba ma pra b+ha sar+b+ba sa twa kle sha san ta pa pra sha ma nA ga ra ma hA ti d+ha ra sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a la~M kA ra ma hA pu ru Sha rU pa d+ha ra rag ko tig ta swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems

dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la nye bar gnas pa de gang yin pa de dag ni gsang sngags dang phyag rgya 'di dag yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na

byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags dang phyag rgya 'di dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu gzugs sna tshogs pa dang 'dra ba'i lus rnams kyis

sems can gyi khams rnams su sems can gdul ba'i dbang gis ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i lus rnams ston to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka'

stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor lo sdom pa gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams lus dang ngag dang yid

bsdams shing spyod par 'gyur ba'i sdom pa dang byang chub kyi sems yod do/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la sdom pa gang zhe na/ bsdam pa ni sdom pa ste lus dang ngag dang yid rnams bsdus shing yongs su bsdus

pa phyi dang nang gi sdug bsngal sel bar 'gyur ba de ni sdom pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'

gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas sdom pa ci ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'

stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di la slob dpon gyis lha spyan drang ba byas la bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklags te dkyil 'khor la phyogs te der 'dug la slob ma rnams la bos te 'di

skad du bu dus gsum du sgrib pa med par gnas pa dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa'i sdom pa nos shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /des kyang thal mo sbyar pus mo btsugs te 'di skad du slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming

'di zhes bgyi ba deng gi dus 'di nas gzung ste/ nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du slob dpon gyis bdag la dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa'i sdom pa stsal du gsol/ ston pa'i bka' spyi bos nod par

'tshal lo zhes smra bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis kyang 'di skad du rigs kyi bu dgongs shig /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa khyod kyis byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du lhag

pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag dbul bar bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sdom pa yin te sdom pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams ni tshul khrims shin tu bsdams shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims bla na med pa la rab tu gnas pa yin no/ /
gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'i sgo 'di la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa 'di la mngon par brtson
par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems gang dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes shing 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

rnams kyi ye shes rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi sems de yang nyon cig de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du byang chub

kyi sems de bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la byang chub gang zhe na byang chub

ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid do/ /nam mkha' yang gzugs med bstan du med gzung du med pa'o/ /byang chub kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa sems kyi mtshan nyid kyang de yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na sems dang

nam mkha' dang byang chub 'di dag ni gnyis su med do/ /'di la chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin no/ /de la mi

skye ba'i tshul dang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems skye ba gang yin pa de ni/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gnas kyi gzhi
lngas byang chub mngon par rtogs par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dngos po thams cad dang bral bar mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /kha cig

ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa stong pa sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /kha cig ni chos la dmigs pas so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'on kyang byang

chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas/ 'di ltar dngos po thams cad dang bral ba phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa

chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rang gi sems thog ma nas ma skyes pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du rtogs par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la dngos po thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin

gshegs pas 'di la bdag gam sems can nam skye ba'am shed las skyes pa yod pa ma yin gyi phung po dang khams dang / skye mched tsam du zad do zhes 'jig rten pa'i lam yongs su spang bar bstan pa yin no/ /phung po khams dang

skye mched dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyi lam mngon par rtogs pa yongs su shes pa'i sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa rnam par gzhag

pa yin no/ /chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams rang gi sems thog ma nas ma skyes par mthong zhing stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo

nyid rdzas med pa mtshan nyid med par mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas gnas med pa sgrib pa med pa spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /

gsang ba pa'i bdag po rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul sgrub pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ma gtogs par bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phan 'dogs pa med par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskal pa du mar 'bad cing btsal te/ btang dka' ba rnams kyang byas pas byang

chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis tshe 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po tshe zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba la 'du shes su bya bar zad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi 'du

shes de yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i sngon rol nyid du 'gags pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la

bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'i dam tshig 'di la 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga rgyang ring du spang bar bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ ser

sna dang sems can la gnod pa dang the tsom dang le lo dang gsang sngags la sogs pa la ma gus pa ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos 'di lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam

du 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyis rgyang ring du spang bar bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos 'di rnams la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la/ byang chub kyi spyad pa cung zad kyang yongs su rdzogs par nga mi smra'o/ /gsang

ba pa'i bdag po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi bar du gcod pa chen po'o/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gsang ba'i snying po 'di'i dam tshig la gnas par gyur pa de'i bsod nams ci tsam zhig 'phel bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' rtogs par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad ma mchis pas de'i

tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' ni rtogs par nus kyang srid kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig mthong ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu

mo'i bsod nams mngon par 'dus byas pa gang yin pa'i bsod nams de'i tshad ni rtogs par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po dkyil 'khor 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba mthong ngo / /gsang ba pa'i bdag po

dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni/ snying po gtso bo snying po thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa ste de'i gong na de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor med do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa gnas su gyur pa skyabs su gyur pa'o/ /

gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang dam tshig 'di la 'jug par 'dod pas/ dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang dam tshig la 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ba gang na ba der 'jig rten

gyi khams me ma mur gyis yongs su gang ba la yang rkang pa gnyis kyis 'bogs te 'gro bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de rnams la yang rigs kyi bu'am

rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes dang pha ma'i 'du shes dang mkhan po'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la ni bdag gi sha dang khrag gis mchod na yang

lan lon par mi 'gyur na mchod pa gzhan gyis lta ga la nus/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang la brten nas sems can dmyal ba'i rgyun chad par 'gyur zhing dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'gro ba dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i

phung po med par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag la ci ltar lan ldon par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam

pa la gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa nam mkha' ltar gnas med pa'i spyod yul can yin par rig par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po ngas khyod la bsgo bar bya'o/ /

shes par bya'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi blun po dmigs pa can la lta ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba mngon par zhen pa blo phyin ci log tu gyur pa bdag gi sems kyi gnas gtan la ma phebs pa rnams rnam par 'khrul nas

'di skad du/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyi 'di dag ni rang bzo can gyis rang bzor byas pa yin no zhes zer ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po mi blun po de dag ni 'gro ba gnyis su

'gro bar rig par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu cung zad kyang yod par nga mi smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni rtsa ba

chad par byed pa la zhugs pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bar du gcod par byed pa bdud kyis zil gyis non pa shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can theg pa chen po la goms par ma byas pa nyan thos kyi theg

pa la snying por 'du shes pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ba de dag la tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos spyod

pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ga la yod ces mi snyan pa smra bar 'gyur te/ mi blun po de dag gis mi snyan pa de smras pas ngan 'gro gnyis su lhung ste/ gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa de ni 'di ltar bcom
ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa des sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir 'di dag thams cad gsungs so/ /de dag la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pas sdug bsngal gyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'dzin pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os par yin par rig par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis phyag

na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de rnams bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis/ khyod kyis rigs

kyi bu de rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung bar gyis shig /yongs su bskyab par gyis gnod pa las kyang bzlog par gyis shig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas

kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed po de dag gis mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rjes ci skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o/ /rigs kyi bu de dag
nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de dag legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis ci nas kyang ston pa'i bstan pa 'jig par mi

'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin de dag thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

rnams kyis bya dka' ba brgya stong du mar bsgrubs pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yin te/ de bas na khyed thams cad kyis nan tan bskyed de de dag bsrung bar gyis shig /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ 'dis ni bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin byed pa'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o zhes bya

bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs bcu 'dzin pa'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i phyir bdag cag rnams kyis rtag tu brtson par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu de dag kyang bsrung

ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin de dag gis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag gis ci nas kyang ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang 'jig par mi

'gyur bar bya ba 'di ni nges par bya dgos so zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba la gzigs nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/

thugs rje chen po thog mar byas nas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsungs so/ /na ma s+t+rai yad d+h+wi kA nAn/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAn/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa ma ta ga ti ga te/ e ka d+d+har+m+ma sam ba sa ra Ne bi tsid tA rU pa d+hA ra NI/

sar+b+ba sa tA tra a b+hi prA ya ba ri pU ra Ni/ sar+b+ba bo d+hi sa twA tra ga ta ma na se/ tra hi ma~M sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma sa ma ma hA ma hI bai ro tsa na gar b+ha sam bud+ha/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te tra hi te b+ha ga ba te hU~M/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis snying rje chen po mngon du byas te/ 'di nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma smras pa/ dang por slob dpon gtsang sbra byas te/ chos

kyi dbyings su gyur pa'i yid kyis bdag rnam par snang mdzad du de'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis bsgyur te dkyil 'khor bri'o/ /sngags pa gsang sngags cho ga la/ /rtag par cho ga snga ma yis/ /phye ma dkar po

blangs nas su/ /snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis ni/ /rtag tu mi g.yo dran byas te/ /dang por tshon rtsi dgye bar bya/ /de nas tshon rtsi gnyis pa ni/ /dmar po blangs nas dgye bar bya/ /tshon rtsi gsum pa ser po yang / /shin du

nges par dgye bar bya/ /de nas margad 'dra ba dgye/ /de nas an da rnyil 'drar dgye/ /gang gi kha dog ci 'drar gsungs/ /de yi dkyil 'khor de nyid do/ /lha yi kha dog de bzhin te/ /zhi dang rgyas dang drag spyod pa/ /de yi gsang

sngags de nyid 'dod/ /'di ni gsang ba bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags gang / /de dag dbang chen yin par bsgrags/ /phyag na pad ma'i chu yi yin/ /rdo rje can gyi rlung gi yin/ /pho nya la sogs
bran rnams dang / /khro bo'i ming du gang gtogs pa/ /kun du thogs med spyod pa rnams/ /kun gyi dkyil 'khor me dang rlung / /yang na 'di dag thams cad kyang / /nus pa'i mthu ni kun dang ldan/ /
stong pa nyid kyi bdud rtsis ngoms/ /snying rje'i mig ni dri ma med/ /byams pa'i go cha legs par bgos/ /dga' ba dri med rtsal dang ldan/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor bying ba yi/ /sems
can 'don par rab tu brtson/ /'khor ba na yang mi gnas shing / /mya ngan 'das la 'ang gnas ma yin/ /yang dag mtha' la nges byas shing / /sems can rnams kyi
don byed pa'o/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la bltas nas tshig smras pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa sdig bral ba/ /
ston pa bcom par ldan pa 'dis/ /bgegs rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gnas/ /gtan la bab par bshad 'gyur ba/ /grogs po kun gyis mnyan par gyis/ /
bgegs ni rnam pa du ma ste/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin min/ /de la bgegs ni rnam gnyis te/ /phyi dang nang gi spyod yul lo/ /glo lu dbugs
brnangs rims dang skyug /skya rbab nad dang yi ga 'chu/ /de la sogs pa'i rims rnams ni/ /rlung grang tsha ba la sogs las/ /mi bzad ngo bo can 'byung ba/ /nang gi yin par shes par
bya/ /phyi rol gyi ni bgegs chen rnams/ /mi dang de bzhin mi min te/ /ye shes tsher ma de dag ni/ /spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /'jig rten gzhig pa'i phyir 'byung ste/ /
dka' thub gnas na rmongs par byed/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /de rnams slar ni bzlog par bya/ /tsha bar gyur nas 'ongs pa'i bgegs/ /bsil bas nye bar zhi bar byed/ /
shes rab can gyis gnyen po yis/ /de dag so sor gso bar bya/ /yang na bgegs rnams thams cad la/ /sngags pas nges par mtshams bcad pa/ /bgegs rnams
kun la ye shes ni/ /zhi bar byed pa'i mchog tu bshad/ /'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa theg pa chen po'i
mdo sde'i rgyal po gsang ba pa'i mchog rim par phye ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po byin gyis rlob pa/ /rdzogs s+ho// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len tra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa'o/ /

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a tsa la ma hA kro d+ha rA dza s+ya sarba ta thA ga ta ta s+ya ba la a pa ri mi ta bI ra bi na ya swA khyA to nA ma kalpa/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags pa

mi g.yo ba de'i stobs dpag tu med pa brtul phod pa 'dul bar gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa/ rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom

ldan 'das rlung la bzhugs te/ rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa rin po che'i gzhal yas khang bye ba grangs med pa du mas bkod cing yongs su bskor ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing grangs med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod

nams las 'khrungs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge'i khri bshams pa rin po ches spras pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar byed pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi lcags ris yongs su bskor cing shin tu yid 'phrog pa/

steng du rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i rin po che'i bla bres nam mkha'i khams go 'byed par snang bar byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pad ma'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las yang dag par byung ba/ sems can thams

cad kyi bsam pa sna tshogs yongs su dga' bar byed pa/ 'od zer chen po phul du byung ba gsal bar byed cing mun nag thams cad rab tu dang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes las 'khrungs pa'i

seng ge'i khri bsam gyis mi khyab pa bye ba du mas yongs su bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa du mas yongs su bskor ba der bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas chos ston to/ /'di lta ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jam

dpal dang / kun du bzang po dang / byams pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / sna tshogs bkod pa dang / nam mkha' me tog 'chang dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / shin du rnam dag dang /

phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen pos yongs su bskor ba/ nyan thos bye ba phrag du ma 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal dang / rta thul dang / 'od srungs la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba/

grags chen snyan pa chen po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / lus ngan po la sogs pas yongs su bskor zhing / bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis chos ston pa 'di lta ste/

gsang sngags kyi tshul la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang thos par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / bsam gyis mi
khyab pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs la dgos pa sna tshogs kyi spyod lam gyis zhugs zhing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnams mdzad do/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bsnyen

bkur dang / yongs su mnyes par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul du ma rnams kyang gzigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa du ma yang mngon par sprul pa mdzad do/ /bkod pa chen po yang

bskyed par mdzad do/ /mdor na thams cad gang dang gang gis sems can gyi don du gzigs pa de dang de mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
thub pa des 'khor chen po rnams la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje bdag gis sna tshogs du ma'i gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rnam

par phyung ste tshig dang yi ge du ma bkod pa sems can sna tshogs mgu bar byed pa/ phyag rgya dang sngags sna tshogs kyis rnam par mtshan par gyur pa/ 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi khyad par brjod pa/ sdug bsngal

sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dbang phyug du ma dang ldan zhing yid 'phrog pa'i yi ge gcig dang / stong phrag brgyad dang / grangs med pa dang / bye ba phrag gsum dang / rjes 'jug dang / ring po dang / thung ngu dang /

nga ro dang / gsal byed kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings bcu la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dpe dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'jig rten pa'i mngon par
shes pa lnga dang / lha'i gnas la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang / mi'i 'gro ba dang / yi dags dang / dud 'gro'i 'gro ba la thug par phye zhing bcad pa rnams gang bdag gis sems can rnams la phan pa'i lhag
pa'i bsam pa bye ba phrag grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa bdun gyi sems can rnams kyi don du gsungs pa yin no/ /de yang gzhi dang me tog gi snying pos brgyan pa'i 'jig rten khams 'dir dar bar gyur to/ /

gsang ba'i bdag po bye ba phrag grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa bdun po de rnams kun gyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa'i

byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag gis thabs sna tshogs kyi cho ga'i sgo bstan te/ gsang ba'i bdag po de rnams la ni mngag gzhug dang / mngag gzhug ma dang / pho nya dang / pho nya mo la sogs pa de rnams

kyi phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rtog pa'i cho ga yang rgyas par bstan to/ /las sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyang bstan te/ sgrub thabs sna tshogs yang dag ldan/ /ras ris cho ga rnam par bstan/ /

yang na las kyi cho ga dbye/ /gang du stobs chen gsang ba'i las/ /sbyin sreg dag ni bdag gis bstan/ /lhag ma de bzhin yul gnas gzhan/ /de nas ma lus me thab dang / /de bzhin zhi ba rgyas pa dang / /dbang du bya

dang mngon spyod dang / /de nas dus kyi khyad par dang / /dkyil 'khor yang ni de bzhin bstan/ /phyag rgya dag kyang ma lus par/ /sa bon dang ni mtshan ma dang / /gsang ba yi ni sngags nyid dang / /rigs kyi mtshan ma de bzhin
sku/ /ma lus pa yi dbyibs dang yang / /de lta bu la sogs pa'i las/ /de dag thams cad bdag gis bstan/ /mi g.yo zhes bya'i rtog pa ni/ /de ni slar yang bdag gis bshad/ /dag pa'i sems dpa' blo ldan
gyis/ /sngags pas gang zhig bsgrub bya yi/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sna tshogs las/ /gsang sngags kyi ni sgrub thabs zhig /rtog pa 'di ru mdor bsdus nas/ /de yi cho ga yang dag bshad/ /yang dag
rdzogs sangs rgyas bsnyen cing / /sgrub pas go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi mchog /chos shes bya bar skye bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus par/ /de ni kun
du dag par 'gyur/ /rtag par rgyun du rnam rtog med/ /nam mkha' yi ni lam la gnas/ /gzugs can lus la brten nas su/ /sems can bye brag thugs su chud/ /sems can zhi ba gdul
dka' dang / /bgegs chen dang ni log par 'dren/ /de nas gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rtag tu sprul/ /mtshan ni mi g.yo ces bsgrags pa/ /khro bo 'phags pa
stobs po che/ /dpal ldan gdul dka' 'dul mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras kyi sras/ /de 'dir rgyal mchog rnams dang ni/ /de bzhin rgyal sras kyis rtag par/ /phyag
'tshal tshangs pa la sogs dang / /lus can thams cad kun tu mchod/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni byas pa gzo/ /de bzhin du ni sangs rgyas sras/ /'di kun smon lam yongs rdzogs shing / /bsam
gyis mi khyab ye shes rdzogs/ /mi g.yo zhes bya'i sa thob pas/ /mi g.yo 'di yang de yi mtshan/ /bdud rnams kun gyis mi g.yo bas/ /rtag pa'i ye shes dri med bzang / /rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul
che/ /bshad kyis bu khyod tshur nyon cig /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /chos kyi dbyings su rab gzhol bas/ /rtag tu tshe dang nad med mchog /dngos grub myur du gsol mdzad pa/ /
rtag tu bgegs rnams gsol byed cing / /de bzhin bdud rnams rab tu 'joms/ /sems can rnams ni bde ba'i phyir/ /rtog pa 'di ni rab tu bshad/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag mgrin gcig gi ngag gis gsol pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang bdag cag la thugs brtse ba bskyed de bcom ldan 'das bshad du
gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas gsol ba btab

pa de mkhyen nas gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas nas/ dpal gyi be'u las byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma grangs med

pas yongs su bskor ba byas nas gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas gzung ste/ ji srid brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab dang mnyam

pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' gtugs pa'i bar du de khyab nas g.yas phyogs nas bskor te/ de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / nub dang / lho dang / shar gyi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i

'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du khebs par byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de rnams na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de thams cad kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /shAkya'i mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /

gzi brjid chen po gang bzhugs pa/ /chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad gshegs/ /de ru dri med dam chos nyon/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul dge ba/ /gang thob 'jig rten mgon pos ni/ /

byang chub 'dus ma byas pa brnyes/ /de nas 'od zer des tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal be'u nyid du zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams
'jig rten gyi khams nas khro bo'i mthus/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyi sems rtse gcig
par mkhyen nas slar yang rdo rje bsgyings pa bsregs pa'i me lce kun du 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ stong gsum
gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /
kun du rab tu ldeg /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun du rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun du rab tu chem chem/
'jig rten du shin tu snang ba dpag tu med par byung bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i cho 'phrul mthong ngo / /snyoms par zhugs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam pa
yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings grangs med par sems can gyi khams rnam par

grol bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par rtog pa med pa'i ye shes kyi me yang dag par byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po
nye bar ston pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gsung gis 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yab/ sems can nyon mongs pa'i mun nag tu lhung ba thams cad kyi snang bar gyur pa/

ngan song dang / ngan 'gror ltung ba thams cad kyi ded dpon/ sdug bsngal bas nyams thag pa rnams kyi bde bar gyur pa/ mdor na sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gang dang gang ldan pa de dang der rab tu zhi bar

byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir ro/ /na maH sar+b+bA sha pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba thA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo'i snying po 'di gsungs
ma thag tu gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang / bdud kyi ris de dag dang / gang sems can thams cad mog mog por byas te/ sems can rnams
kyi sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byed pa'i snang ba mdzad de/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas ma lus pa'i srid pa'i bdag po'i sa gzhi rab tu 'gul

bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngo mtshar rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje 'di ni khro ba'i rgyal

po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchog gi de kho na nyid/ stong nyid 'di las gzhan dag byung / /chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid de/ /'di las rgyal ba byung ba mthong / /'di ru rgyal ba thams cad bzhugs/ /srid pa'i khams ni 'di

las sprul/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /ma byon pa de de bzhin gzhan/ thams cad 'di las yang dag byung / /nam mkha' lta bu dri ma med/ /spros pa thams cad rnam par bral/ /ngag gi spyod yul rnam par spangs/ /

rtag par spros pa med pa nyid/ /nam mkha' lta bur gnas pa yin/ /tha snyad sngon du byas nas ni/ /gsang sngags rjes su brjod pa yin/ /tha snyad kyang ni rtog pa ste/ /de nyid du ni brjod pa med/ /tha snyad la ni brten nas su/ /

skyob pas de nyid gsungs pa yin/ /sems can med de sgyu ma bzhin/ /yid kyis bsgom par bya ba yin/ /la lar sgyu ma ci bzhin du/ /rang bzhin med par yang gyur te/ /stong nyid de yi rang bzhin du/ tha snyad rnams

ni rtogs par bya/ /de ltar gsang sngags mgon po 'di/ /rang bzhin med par mnyam par mdzes/ /'dod pa'i don rnams stsol ba yang / /thams cad kyang ni rdzogs par byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po kun du bzang po la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang po la sogs pa rnams shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du gyur cing snying po rnams spangs te/ de thams cad bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bltas
nas/ tshig 'di dag mgrin gcig gi ngag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sngon chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'di bskor ba bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/ /
bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
kyi spyod yul ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig to can rnams dang / bgegs kyi gzugs can thams cad gyis bgom par mi nus lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi don dam pa'i yid
bzhin gyi nor bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mngon par 'dod pa'i don skong ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / sems can rnams kyi srungs ma lags so/ /
bcom ldan 'das 'di ni srin po dang grul bum la sogs pa thams cad kyis 'da' bar mi nus pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha la sogs pa'i 'khor de rnams la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ gtsug lag legs so legs so/ /slar yang gtsug lag nges par legs so/ /

de ltar gtsug lag 'di'i tshig brjod pa mdzes pa de ltar ji lta ba de bzhin du yin no/ /'on kyang bsrung ba byed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzhung 'di bdag gis gti mug gi mun pas g.yogs pa'i sems can sdug
bsngal ba rnams la bltas nas gsungs te/ 'di ni nyan par ma nus pa'i/ /go 'phang rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs/ /de rnams the tsom phyir bdag gis/ /ye shes sgron me yang dag spar/ /
byis pa sdug bsngal yang dag khengs/ /sa gzhi steng ni 'di na gnas/ /tshul 'di rab tu mi shes pas/ /khyim gyi bcing ba dam pos bcings/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdag po lag na
rdo rjes mig gnyis 'bru tshugs su bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar te/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mthu che lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i

rgyal po de'i snying po'i gzi brjid dang mthu ni bdag gis mi bzod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po 'di ni gdul dka' 'dul ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/

gsang ba'i bdag po 'di ni ci skad du smras pa de bzhin no/ /'on kyang gsang ba'i bdag po bdag ni gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i mthus nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bdud ci snyed las rgyal lo/ /gsang ba'i bdag

po gang yang bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dod pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams dga' bar byed pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa'i bsam pa tha dad pa
rnams la bstan pa de rnams ni 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bdag gis bstan to/ /gang yang gsang ba'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chen po dbang thang thams cad thob pa'i ye shes kyi stobs brtul phod
pa mnyes pa 'di yang snying po'i byin gyis brlabs kyi yin no/ /gcig tu sems can don rab brtson/ /sa gzhi la ni rnam par bzhugs/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /sprul pa rnams
kyang 'gyed par mdzad/ /mchod cing mnyes par rtag tu ni/ /rgyal ba zhing nas yang dag bzhugs/ /ji srid phyogs rnams gnas kyi bar/ /rtag par rgyun du mchod 'gyur ba'i/ /sangs rgyas
kun ni mnyam pa ru/ /byang chub ces bya 'di las bzhugs/ /rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams ni/ /skye ba dang ni 'gags pa yin/ /tha snyad la ni brten gnas su/ /gang zhig sgyu ma bzhin du
gsungs/ /sgyu ma stong pa nyid yin ltar/ /chos rnams mtshan nyid de bzhin no/ /'on kyang gsang ba'i bdag po bdag gis bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag grangs med kyi bskal

pa snyed du sems can sna tshogs kyi lus blangs nas sdug bsngal spyad de mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / yan lag gi mchog dang chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / glang po dang / glang dang /
shing rta la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams yongs su btang ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa rnams

kyi tshul gyis bsam pa sna tshogs dang / 'dod pa sna tshogs pa la sgra dbyangs dang / tshig dang / yi ge bstan cing spyod lam sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma'i cha byad dang / dbyibs kyi khyad par can gyis bdag gis

sems can rnams kyi don byas shing gang byang chub kyi snying por bdud bzhi bcom pa de thams cad gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i mthus byas so/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rnams 'phel bar byed pa bdud las kyang rgyal
bar byed pa bstan pa thams cad kyi don yod par byed pa/ gzhan yang sna tshogs ma lus pa'i bgegs las kyang rgyal bar byed pa ste/ 'di las gnyis pa gzhan yod min/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi
'gyur sngags/ /de bas snying gar gzhag nas kyang / /ci ltar bde bar rnam par gnas/ /spang bar byed pa'i bgegs kyang med/ /glags tshol gzhan yang yod ma yin/ /rtag tu dgra yi 'jigs
pa 'ang med/ /rkun la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa 'ang med/ /'jigs pa kun las rnam par grol/ /de yi snying gar gnas bsgoms pas/ /bdag ni yun rings bsgral ba ru/ /'khor ba'i
rgya mtsho 'jigs pa las/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i gtso/ /go 'phang bdag gis ji ltar 'thob/ /bdag gis ci yang thob med par/ /tshul 'di las ni rnam spyod nas/ /de 'dir mi 'gyur thob
par bya/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis rgyas pa thob/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yi/ /gsang sngags sgrub thabs bsten par bya/ /de nas yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od/ /sku ni 'di ru thob par 'gyur/ /
gang zhig tshul 'dir gnas pa yi/ /de rnams kyi ni dngos grub phyir/ /gang tshe sngags pas mnyam gzhag pas/ /de bas ma brnyes pa yang 'thob/ /'dis ni mi phyed pa yang 'byed/ /mi rgyal ba las ma lus
rgyal/ /gang tshe gsang sngags rgyal po bsten/ /de las 'bras med ci yang med/ /gsang sngags stobs chen dran pa ni/ /las ni 'dod pa byed par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi mgon po ma lus pa/ /'di ni
myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang tshe gsang sngags 'bras 'dod pas/ /'dir ni the tsom mi bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag ngo mtshar ba'i snying po
ma spangs par sgra skad gcig tu dungs pa'i dbyangs kyis gsol pa/ e ma'o sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sems can don rnams thugs su chud/ /rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin yang / /bsam mi
khyab pa'i go 'phang shod/ /gang zhig 'chang bar byed pa'i mi/ /de yi ngan 'gro rnam par bcad/ /gang gis lag tu chud pa ltar/ /de yi dngos grub lag mthil gnas/ /'jigs pa med cing nga yir med/ /
dogs pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /zad par sa la bzhugs nas su/ /sems can la ni ma bsam byed/ /gsang sngags rgyal po skyob pa yis/ /bdag cag thams cad skyob par byed/ /'dod pa'i

don ni byed 'dod pas/ /gsungs pa yid kyis sgom par byed/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di dag tshig 'di brjod nas de ma thag tu cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te

spyan rgyas shing shAkya'i rigs dga' ba la gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshig gi nus pa med do/ /de nas nam mkhar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ngo mtshar 'di thos nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la steng gi nam

mkha' la sna tshogs pa'i me tog gis snyim pa bkang ste bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ rtag tu dag cing dri med pa/ /rtag par rgyun du rtog pa med/ /rtag tu rtog pa med par bzhugs/ /
dpa' bo chen po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khyod kyi chos kun g.yo ba med/ /thams cad legs sbyar spyod yul bas/ /rtag tu g.yo ba med mkhyen pas/ /spros dang bral la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sems can rnams

la phan 'dod pas/ /spyod pa spyad pa gsungs pa ste/ /dag pa rnams ni yang dag phyug /dag pa'i sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ji ltar nam mkha' bzhin du dag /rdul phran thams cad rnam par spangs/ /de ltar

mgon khyod sku yang ni/ /kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /shel sgong bzhin du shin tu dag /nam mkha' lta bur spros pa med/ /dngos po thams cad rnam dag pas/ /ye shes rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal bstod/ /nam mkha'

la ni 'ja' tshon ltar/ /gtso bo khyod ni rtag tu mthong / /de ltar dag pa'i sems can gyis/ /rtag tu gtso bo khyod mthong ngo / /ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par grol/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod nyid 'khrungs/ /dbyings kyi snying po
yang dag byung / /ye shes gcig tu gzi brjid che/ /sa gzhi thams cad nges pa ru/ /sems can sdug bsngal kun tu gzigs/ /sdug bsngal 'di ni zad byas nas/ /bla med go 'phang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gsang sngags

rnams kyi gtso sngags 'di/ /chos rnams kyi ni blo 'phel bar/ /rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad bskyed/ /gtso bo khyod kyis gsungs pa yis/ /dang po thams cad yang dag 'gyur/ /rgyal ba bdag nyid rgyu med 'khrugs/ /las

dang skye bas rnam par grol/ /rgyal mchog gtso bor 'khrungs par 'gyur/ /ye shes me lce rang bzhin med/ /'dus byas thams cad rnam par spangs/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gcig /rgyal ba bla med phyag 'tshal 'dud

ces so/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas sngags kyi tshig gi don zhus pa/ bcom ldan gsang sngags ji ltar bsgrub/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni ji ltar lags/ /sgrub thabs

rtsa ba ci zhes bya/ /ji ltar yang ni de bstan lags/ /ji ltar sems ni dag pa'i phyir/ /gtso bo 'di ni ci zhig bsgom/ /ji ltar de ni 'bras bu med/ /sngags pa yis ni brten par bya/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang /

bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byang chub sems ni bstan byas nas/ /sngags kyi dngos grub brjod par bya/ /sngags kyi dngos grub bya ba'i mchog /

gzhan du thams cad 'bras bu med/ /ji ltar rtsa ba bskyed min na/ /shing gi me tog 'bras bu med/ /de ltar gsang sngags 'bras bu shes/ /byang chub sems ni rtsa ba yin/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed nas su/ /
bla na med pa'i go 'phang 'thob/ /'di la gnas pa'i chos kun ni/ /skye dang gnas pas 'byung ba ste/ /dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus nas/ /rang bzhin med cing bsam du med/ /byang chub sems ni
nges par 'thob/ /gzhan du 'ba' zhig par 'gyur ro/ /bu ni seng ge 'dra yin te/ /stong nyid 'dus byas sgom par byed/ /srid pa thams cad sgyu ma yin/ /gang zhig bsam pa'i 'bras bur gnas/ /
mu stegs rnams kyi 'dod bshad pa/ /bdag dang srog dang gang zag bcas/ /gtso bo skyes bur bshad pa dang / /gang du khyab par gnas pa dang / /de ltar 'khor ba rnams brtags nas/ /'khor ba'i dngos
po 'ba' zhig ste/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis rmongs nas/ /byis pa sdug bsngal bden pa can/ /log pa'i zhags pas bcings pa yi/ /sdug bsngal ba de rnams bltas nas/ /de rnams kun la brjod pa yin/ /

'di skad gsung ni bka' stsal to/ /srog med sems can kyang yod min/ /byed pa po med gtso bo 'ang med/ /khyab pa med cing dngos po 'ang med/ /rdzas la sogs pa'i rang bzhin med/ /log shes rang bzhin zhags
pa ni/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba rnam par spangs/ /dngos po thams cad rnam par bral/ /sna tshogs ji bzhin rnam bsgoms pas/ /dngos po kun las rnam par grol/ /stong pa nyid kyi go 'phang 'thob/ /phyi rol

nang gi khyad par gyis/ /de ltar thams cad rnam par bsgom/ /dbu ba chu bur dang sgyu ma/ /stong nyid 'ba' zhig las ldang ste/ /de ltar thams cad rnam bsgoms nas/ /ye shes go 'phang ngo rnams rtog /sdig
pa'i cho ga las grol nas/ /'chi med go 'phang du grol 'gyur/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /gzhan yang gzung 'dzin rnams las 'das/ /kun mkhyen ye shes zhags pa ni/ /'chi ba'i don du
rab tu brtag /gang du phung po khams med cing / /skye mched rnams ni 'byung ba med/ /dngos po kun las rnam grol bar/ /rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu gsungs/ /gang du kun gzhi rnam shes med/ /
bdag med gang zag kyang yod min/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sa steng 'di/ /gang du thams cad sgyu mar gsungs/ /nga ni kun mkhyen mnga' brnyes pa/ /sems can don rnams thugs su chud/ /cho ga bya ba

la zhugs phyir/ /bu la ma lus par bshad do/ /gang zhig kun gzhi yod pa dang / /gal te rnam shes kyang yod pa/ /de yi bdag nyid bdag gi bu/ /yod do zhes kyang bstan gyur pa/ /dngos po'i gdon gyis brlams
pa yi/ /byis pas sdug bsngal rnams mthong nas/ /bdag gis gzhug par bya phyir bu/ /cho ga rgyas pa gsungs pa yin/ /sems can med cing srog kyang med/ /gang zag med cing byed po 'ang med/ /
rnam shes med cing kun gzhi med/ /gang la bdag med dbang phyug med/ /skyes bu med cing khyab pa 'ang med/ /dngos po med cing sgyu yang med/ /dngos po kun las rnam par grol/ /dam chos dri ma med pa
bshad/ /de nyid mchog gi gtso bo ste/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang bsten/ /rtag par rgyun du go 'phang bsten/ /rtag tu rgyun du bsgom par bya/ /byang chub sems ni rnam par bsgom/ /
gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam grol bar/ /dngos po thams cad rnam par sbyang / /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /thams cad stong nyid sgyu ma ltar/ /byang chub sems ni bsdus pa nyid/ /byang chub sems

dpa' blo ldan gyis/ /de ltar yid kyis bsgom par bya/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nye/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas nyid kyi thugs/ /bag yod pas ni rtag bsten na/ /byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'char/ /bsnyen
par gyur na 'bras bu chung / /gsang sngags spyod pas gang dag skye/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i sku/ /byang chub sems kyis 'thob par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' lta bur gos med pa'i/ /sku ni kun du 'thob par
'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni bsgom pa yi/ /bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab bshad/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che kun gyis/ /'bras bu 'ang bsam gyis mi khyab gsungs/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ rdo rje'i skabs su rtol ba blangs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
ye shes rgya mtsho las byung ba'i/ /khyod kyi sras po nga mnyes gshin/ /'di dag shin tu som nyi za/ /bdag gis ji ltar rtogs par bgyi/ /gang yang byams pa la sogs gzhan/ /sa bcu ma lus pa thams cad/ /
'di la the tshom 'tshal zhing mchis/ /thub pa chen po bshad du gsol/ /gang zhig sems can don ma byas/ /bsod nams ye shes rnam par spangs/ /de rnams la ni thugs brtse'i phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di
gsol 'debs/ /de ring bdag la ma lus par/ /sems can phan pas brtson par gsungs/ /'di yi mthu stobs kyang ni ci/ /'di yi pha rol gnon pa ci/ /mi g.yo zhes bya'i gtso khyod kyis/ /'dir
ni ji ltar yang dag gsungs/ /'di las gzhan pa'i go 'phang med/ /'di dag thams cad gsung du gsol/ /gang gi go 'phang de 'grub pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor yang ni bshad du gsol/ /gang gis sa
steng 'di thob pa'i/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i go 'phang gsungs/ /gsang sngags kyi ni tshad kyang gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor yang ni ji ltar lags/ /mgon po 'di la the tshom za/ /gang 'dir 'gro ba la phan
phyir/ /sngags kyi dngos grub de bzhin gsungs/ /de nyid las kyi dbye ba yang / /mngon spyod kyang ni rab tu bshad/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dag gis/ /mgon pos ji ltar cher myur bar/ /sngags bzlas
pa yi 'bras bu mchis/ /mgon pos bzla ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sa steng 'dir ni de ji ltar/ /de yang tshim dang bsang gtor dag /khro bo'i rgyal po dang ldan pa/ /mgon pos de dag thams cad
gsungs/ /nyi ma gcig gi nyin phyed nas/ /zla ba brgyad pa'i skad cig tu/ /dngos grub dag ni yang dag gsungs/ /dug gi las kyi gso sbyong dang / /rdzas kyis sbyor ba'i las sna tshogs/ /mngon par
brjod pa yang dag 'byung / /ma lus pa ni bshad du gsol/ /gang gis dngos grub thob pa yi/ /mgon po gzhan ni ma mchis te/ /gtso bo khyod spangs gzhan med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo
rnams/ /nyan thos rang rgyal rdzu 'phrul che/ /gang yang 'jig rten par grags pa'i/ /tshangs sbyor rdzu 'phrul cher bshad pa/ /de rnams kyi yang mgon skyabs ni/ /gtso bo khyod spangs gzhan ma mchis/ /
de nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pas slar yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ chos kyi rgyal po sngags kyi sgo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bshad du gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad spyod pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi phyir/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /gang gis bcom ldan nyid kyis gzigs/ /chos kyi dga' bde
thob pa ni/ /sa gzhi'i steng na rnam par gnas/ /gsang sngags mnyes par rab brtson zhing / /mthong ba'i chos la bde thob pa'i/ /sems can sa stengs gnas pa yi/ /the tsom med par 'byung bar
'gyur/ /thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang 'thob/ /'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /gsang sngags rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /'jig rten 'di ru byung bar 'gyur/ /sdang ba'i srin po thams cad
dang / /'byung po gdon dang sha za dang / /'jigs su rung dang drag shul las/ /sems can rnams la gnod bshad pa/ /gsang sngags stobs chen dran pa yis/ /de dag thams cad 'byung mi 'gyur/ /

sa stengs sems can ma rungs pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan yang bshad/ /de rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rtog pa 'di ni rab tu gsungs/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /grul bum dang ni lus srul po/ /

smyo byed rgyu skar thams cad dang / /ma rungs gza' sogs bshad pa dang / /sems can sdig can de rnams la/ /khro bo 'di ni rab tu gsungs/ /tshangs sogs gdon gyi tshogs kun dang / /de bzhin rgyal po nyan thos dang / /
sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /gang zhig bshad par mi nus shing / /de dag thams cad thal bar rlog /gsang sngags bzlas pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /snying la gnas pa yang dag bsam/ /gsang sngags zhes bya

mthong dka' zhing / /ma lus pa ru thal bar brlags/ /tshangs pa la sogs dkyil 'khor dang / /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /dbang po'i gnas bcu bdag po yis/ /'di ni bzod par mi nus te/ /khro bo'i rgyal

po rol pa ni/ /sdang ba'i sems can ci nas kyang / /ras bal 'da' ba mtshungs par brtag /ming nas smos pa tsam gyis ni/ /phyogs bcu rnams su 'byer bar 'gyur/ /de bas rnam pa thams cad kyis/ /gsang sngags

'di ru bzlas pa ni/ /rtag par rgyun du dran par bya/ /gsang sngags dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /thams cad du ni 'jigs med par/ /sngags gnas sa stengs 'di ru bya/ /gsang sngags mgon po dran pa dang / /'chang ba dang ni
rtag tu zlos/ /me yi nang du gnas pa ni/ /mche ba gtsigs pa yi ni skus/ /'byer te rtag tu 'jigs pa med/ /mtho ris them skas lta bur dga'/ /'jigs shing skrag pas 'khrigs pa na/ /rgyal po chen pos
'jigs pa sel/ /chom rkun gseb tu chud pa na/ /seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i sku/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /de yis rtag tu dran par byas/ /rims dang so mig gzer zug dang / /rked pa'i

rtsibs logs lus las byung / /rnam pa sna tshogs kun 'byung ba'i/ /sa stengs lus can nad rnams ni/ /gsang sngags dran pa tsam nyid kyis/ /de dag thams cad zad par 'gyur/ /khro rgyal bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /

mthu dang stobs ni brtul phod pa'i/ /kun mkhyen las gzhan sa stengs na/ /rtag tu bzod gnas su zhig yod/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i mthu stobs ni/ /ji ltar smra bar mi nus pa/ /de bzhin khro rgyal bsgyings pa yis/ /

brjod par yang ni mi nus so/ /ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba yi/ /yon tan mi g.yos bgrang mi nus/ /de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po yi/ /stobs ni brjod par mi nus so/ /rdo rje pad ma'i rigs zhes pa'i/ /khro bo'i rgyal

po thams cad kyang / /khro bo'i mngag gzhug pho nya dang / /bka' nyan pho nya rdzu 'phrul che/ /de rnams kyis ni khro bo 'di/ /'khor los sgyur ba zhes su brjod/ /khro bo'i rgyal po blo ldan gyis/ /mthu stobs de ltar
bshad pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dpal gcig 'di/ /de yi dpa' bo zhes su bshad/ /gang gsungs bden pa'i tshig gyur pas/ /mi slu ba ni nyid yin no/ /de phyir 'di ni mi g.yo bas/ /mi g.yo ba zhes mngon
par brjod/ /mi g.yo ba yi sa thob pa/ /bsam gtan rtse gcig blo yis gnas/ /nyan thos sa la sogs pa yi/ /bdud rnams kun gyis mi g.yo ba'i/ /de nas mgon pos mtshan gsol to/ /rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo rnams/ /'di ni don kun 'grub par byed/ /gang yang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /gang yang de bzhin ma byon pa/ /mgon po da ltar bzhugs pa gang / /

'gro la phan phyir cho ga ni/ /de dag kun gyis 'di gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya bar bshad/ /sems can khams ni thams cad kyi/ /bstan pa gang yin bsrung bar mdzad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa
gang / /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen gyis/ /gang yang gsang sngags grangs med pa/ /sems can phan 'dogs bzhugs par gsungs/ /lag na rdo rje blo ldan pa/ /'di dag thams cad yang dag bshad/ /

mi gang sdig pas bsgribs med kyi/ /sems can snang ba bskyed par byed/ /mi byed sdig ba'i zhags pas bcings/ /bla na med pa'i go 'phang 'gyur/ /khro bo'i rgyal po blo dang ldan/ /sngags pas ma bsgrubs pa yang

'grub/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i byin brlabs kyis/ /'dod pa ma lus 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag ngo mtshar te/ dga' zhing mig rgyas pas mgrin gcig dang ngag gcig tu tshig snyan
pos gsol pa/ e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /thabs dang shes rab bsam du med/ /thugs rjer gyur pa'i thugs kyis ni/ /mtshungs med dam tshig bshad du gsol/ /gang yang sems can 'jigs
pas 'khrigs/ /sa stengs thams cad 'jigs med cing / /gang gis gus chen rang bzhin gyis/ /de yi ngan 'gro stongs par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad rgyal po'i dbang phyug gi go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur ba/ bgegs dang log 'dren

thams cad kyis 'tshe bar mi nus pa/ dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed pa/ dbang phyug thams cad yang dag par ldan par byed pa bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems

dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /lag na rdo rje slar yang shin tu legs so/ /khyod kyis kho bo la gsol ba btab pa'i don 'di rigs kyi bu nyon/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil

'khor 'di gang gis thos pas sa stengs su thams cad ngo mtshar zhing rgyas te nus pa med pas bzod par mi nus te/ de nas sa stengs su 'gyel bar 'gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe bdud thams cad bsreg pa'i

me lce yang dag par byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa/ dus gsum kun gyi byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa bskyed

par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don gsal bar byed cing yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'khrungs pa/ sems can thams cad kyis shin tu mthong bar dka' ba/ mthong ba'i bgegs

rnams rab tu 'joms pa/ ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ gdon ma rungs pa thams cad la gso sbyong mdzad pa/ bdud kyi dgra thams

cad las rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa'i sngags bka' stsal pa/ na maH sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sar+b+bA sha pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH sar+b+ba thA/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hU~M traT hA~M ma~M/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po bka' stsal ma thag tu

thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag chu shing gi sdong bu lta bu dang nags tshal chen po lta bur bab chol du kha bub tu 'gyel bar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa dang / ldeg pa dang /

'gul ba dang / rab tu 'gul ba dang / g.yos pa dang / rab tu g.yos pa dang / chem chem/ rab tu chem chem mo/ /lho phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma' bar gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ngo mtshar zhing rmad du byung ba mthong ste ngo mtshar che bar

gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams sna tshogs pa yang mthong ngo / /gang yang gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yi bgegs sna tshogs dang / srin po dang bdud kyi

rigs sna tshogs dang / gzhan yang gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dag thams cad thal bar brlags te kha cig kha sbub du gnas/ /'jig pa'i bskal pa lta bur ni/ /dud pa dud skyar kun tu gnas/ /nyi ma zla ba rdzu 'phrul che/ /

'di yi snang ba 'ang mun par 'gyur/ /mun nag smag ni shin tu 'jigs/ /glog 'gyu yul na 'jigs su rung / /phyogs kun du ni 'o dod 'bod/ /sa gzhi thams cad kun du 'khrug /gza' dang rgyu skar tshogs kun dang / /gang yang

lha yi gtso bo gzhan/ /de dag thams cad 'jigs dngangs nas/ /sems med kha sbub tu ni 'gyel/ /lha min mi 'am ci dang klu/ /gnod sbyin srul po lus srul po/ /'di rnams lus kyis ma bzod pas/ /dug gis btab bzhin gnyid

yur te/ /'di dag thams cad gcig tu 'bar/ /bskal pa'i me las yang dag byung / /'di dag thams cad 'bar zhing mched/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni kun nas kyang / /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /sa bcu gnas kyi dbang

phyug rnams/ /de yang gnyid bro yur bar 'gyur/ /kha sbub tu ni sa la 'gyel/ /khro mo mngag gzhug bka' nyan pa/ /pho nya pho mo bran dang bcas/ /lus 'di'i tshugs ni mi thub par/ /sems stor kha sbub 'gyel bar gyur/ /

gang yang nyan thos bse ru dang / /'jig rten rdzu 'phrul chen po gzhan/ /lcags ni shing phye thul ba ltar/ /de yang gnas su 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa brgya byin la sogs lha/ /lha min gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul che/ /de dag

thams cad thal bar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal 'khrigs par 'gyur na ni/ /chung zad slar yang phan tshun du/ /byed cing 'jigs pas tshig smras te/ /bu gcig 'di ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /sa gzhi 'di dag shin tu 'jigs/ /bde gshegs

go 'phang ma gtogs pa/ /zhi ba ci yang ma mthong ngo / /bdud dang bgegs kyi gzugs rnams kyang / /rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag gnas/ /lus ni 'gyur ba lta bu ru/ /sa stengs na ni shing bzhin gnas/ /tshangs pa la sogs

yul rnams ni/ /'di dag thams cad 'bar bar mthong / /mnar med gyur pa'i lus kyang ni/ /dud ka dud skyar kun tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus pa/ /'di dag thams cad bsreg par byed/ /snying rje zhugs shing yang dag ldan/ /

phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad gsol/ /sems can don du ma bsags pas/ /bcom ldan bkod pa bsdu ru gsol/ /byis pa sdug bsngal rten can gyis/ /'di ni bzod par mi nus so/ /'gro ba'i sems can kun gyi mgon/ /thugs

rje rnams ni byung bar mdzad/ /thugs brtse gcig pu'i ri las 'khrungs/ /sems can sdug bsngal 'grol mdzad pa'i/ /'gro ba'i mgon po khyod gcig pu/ /gnyen du gyur pa 'ang khyod kho na/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las

sgrol ba'i/ /mnyan pa 'ang ni khyod gcig pu/ /nad rnams thams cad gso mdzad pa'i/ /khyod nyid gcig pu sman par 'gyur/ /dam pa'i lam ston pa yang khyod/ /khyod ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ba/ /sa stengs nyid ni
khyod 'ba' zhig /mgon po thugs rje bskyed nas ni/ /sa gzhi thams cad yang dag 'phel/ /dpag bsam shing bzhin don gnyer ba'i/ /yang dag dpa' bo byang chub sems/ /sa bcu'i gnas kyi dbang phyug rnams/ /

mgon po khyod nyid gcig pus 'phel/ /thugs rje pad ma 'dam skyes bzhin/ /sems ni ngan par 'gyur ba yi/ /'gro ba'i mgon pos bsreg par mdzod/ /snying po med pa lta bur 'gyur/ /chu shing gi ni sdong po bzhin/ /

phye ma leb bzhin skye bo rnams/ /drag tu bod pa'i lung thob pa/ /bsregs kyang zug rngu mi 'byung ste/ /de bzhin 'dir ni byis pa rnams/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / /grangs med bcu yi stobs kyi bdag /
gsang sngags rgyal po brjod pa yis/ /de dag thams cad thal bar brlag /de bas rnam pa thams cad kyis/ /bcom ldan khyod la bdag gsol 'debs/ /khyod kyi sras po bdag mnyes gshin/ /bdag gi de ni gsan pa'i

rigs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs mnga' bas phyag na rdo rje sems can la phan pa'i phyir/ thub pa mchog gi gtso bo la/ /gsol ba btab pa'i tshig 'di ni/ shin tu rgya che bu lags

so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyi srog 'byung zhing ye shes 'khrung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di sems can thams cad la

phan par byed pa/ 'dus byas thams cad rab tu 'gyur bar byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu 'jigs par byed pa/ dgra thams cad dang me dang chu sel bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dpal phun sum tshogs shing skal ba

bzang ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang rgyal skyed par byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad bsreg par byed pa/ rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub

sems dpa' thams cad kyi bzhed pa gsungs pa/ na maH sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sar+b+ba sha ba ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH sar+b+ba thA/ oM sar+b+ba sa~M ska ri pa ri Sh+kA ba ra bi shud d+ha/ d+har+m+ma te ma hA ya na pa ri bA re swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis stong

gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bde ba thams cad gtad cing kun nas rgyal ba dang ldan pa/ dbang phyug go 'phang brnyes pa ni/ /rang gi lus la sems bcug pas/ /ngang tshul bzang por yang dag

'byung / /sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi/ /bcom ldan 'das ni gzigs par 'gyur/ /rig par gyur pa'i sems dang ldan/ /thams cad rang gi srog dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul brtul phod par gyur pa/ /shin tu ngo mtshar go 'phang

'thob/ /de ni rgyal mchog spyan sngar gnas/ /rang gzhan brtul zhugs brtan 'gyur ba/ /rig pa 'di yi mthu stobs kyis/ /rang gi rdzu 'phrul g.yul las rgyal/ /sa stengs pha rol gnon pa 'byung / /thams cad dbang phyug go

'phang 'thob/ /bdud kun gyi ni gtsor gyur pa/ /sa stengs gyur to cog kun ni/ /'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bral/ /ngan 'gro zhes ni gang bshad pa'i/ /shin tu sdug bsngal gting gnas te/ /ngan 'gro thams cad rnam dral nas/ /bde ba

yi ni snod du 'gyur/ /dmyal ba'i me zhes bya ba yi/ /shin tu blta dka' 'jigs rung de/ /de tshe lhag par bsil bar 'gyur/ /ston ka'i zla ba'i cha ltar gnas/ /gang yang dmyal ba zhes bshad pa/ /shin tu grang ba'i mun nag 'khrigs/ /

drag shul me chen 'bar ba bzhin/ /de dag thams cad grol bar 'gyur/ /yi dags zhes bya'i sdug bsngal gang / /shin tu mi bzad 'jigs su rung / /rig pa 'di yi mthu stobs kyis/ /'di dag thams cad bral bar 'gyur/ /

gang yang 'khor de thams cad ni/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni sems gdungs pa/ /bde ba thams cad yang dag gtad/ /phan tshun du ni dga' gtam smra/ /bgegs chen log par 'dren pa dang / /gzhan yang srog chags gyur pa gzhan/ /

sa stengs 'byung po rang sems gnas/ /des par gyur nas 'di rnams ni/ /gcig la gcig ni blta bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dang / /tshangs pa la sogs rdzu 'phrul che/ /rang sems mdzes par rnal mar ni/ /

de rnams thams cad bde ba 'thob/ /pho nya mngag gzhug bka' nyan rtsol/ /'byung po gdon dang sha za dang / /thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang 'thob/ /sa gzhi steng na rnam par gnas/ /gang yang byang chub sems dpa'

brtan/ /thams cad dang ni ldan pa yi/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'khor rnams kyis/ /'gro la phan phyir tshig gsol pa/ /e ma'o kun mkhyen mtshungs pa med/ /thabs kyi ye shes bsam mi lang / /sa stengs khyod ma
gtogs pa yi/ /'byung 'gyur gzhan ni su zhig yod/ /mtha' yas bde ba'i snod du ni/ /'di dag thams cad gang 'dzin mdzad/ /thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang brnyes/ /sa yi steng na rnam par gnas/ /srid pa
sdug bsngal sngar yang med/ /de ltar shin tu mi bzad 'jigs/ /thams cad sangs rgyas sras su 'gyur/ /sems can kun la phan dga' bas/ /sems ni rtse gcig gyur pa yis/ /snyan pa yi ni

tshig gis gsol/ /kun gyi gnyen du gyur pa ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa med/ /sems ni smad pa'i rgyu gyur pa 'ang / /so so nas ni bde bar mdzad/ /skyes pas yang dag bstan pa ni/ /ji srid mya ngan ma 'das pa/ /

de srid bar du 'khor bar zhugs/ /sangs rgyas theg pa tshul gyi mchog /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / /tshangs pa la sogs 'khor rnams ni/ /thams cad stan las langs gyur te/ /gtso bo gang na bzhugs pa der/ /

byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bskor/ /tshangs sogs rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha/ /lhan cig yang dag par lhags te/ /bla med go 'phang gsol ba 'debs/ /sems can kun la phan bzhed pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskor ba

byas/ /'jig rten mgon la rab btud nas/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig gsol to/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag /sems can kun la smin par dgyes/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yi/ /thabs ni mtshungs med bsam mi khyab/ /

gang gis 'dir ni gnas par byas/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnam par sbyong / /'gro la sman pa khyod mthong na/ /bde ba yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs zab pas/ sgra dbyangs 'di

skad kyis tshig bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa khyed la 'jigs/ /rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis mchog gi ni/ /bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag gsungs/ /de 'dra'i chos ni brten pa ni/ /sdug bsngal

gang gis slar yang ni/ /'khor bar de ltar 'ching 'gyur ba/ /bsnyen par gyur pas 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis mchog gi ni/ /theg pa chen po yang dag gsungs/ /lam ni yang dag bsdus nas ni/ /thams cad sdug bsngal

las rab grol/ /de ni mchog gi de nyid zhi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi theg par brjod/ /theg pa dam pa 'di gzung nas/ /sangs rgyas nges par gdon mi za/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas kun dang ni/ /de bzhin gang yang ma byon pa/ /mgon po da ltar

bzhugs pa rnams/ /'gro la phan pa'i tshul nyid las/ /de dag thams cad yang dag gzung / /sdug bsngal zhi ba thob par 'gyur/ /de phyir rnam pa thams cad kyi/ /'di lta bu yi dam chos bsten/ /gtso bo 'di ni bsnyen gyur na/ /sdug

bsngal rnams ni sel bar byed/ /gang yang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan/ /tshangs pa la sogs rdzu 'phrul che/ /sems can phan par bzhugs pa yi/ /spyan sngar snyan pa'i tshig 'di gsol/ /mgon po khyod kyis ci zhig gsungs/ /

bdag gi yid kyang rten gzhan med/ /khyod nyid skyabs su gyur pa las/ /mchog gzhan zhig ni yod ma yin/ /kun gyis dbang phyug go 'phang brnyes/ /rang gi rdzu 'phrul snyems tshul gyur/ /'jigs pa kun dang rnam par

bral/ /sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par spangs/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po gus par ldan/ /theg pa chen por yang dag gnas/ /byang chub mdzad pa la sogs 'thad ces pa'o/ /de nas

byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po bdag cag la thugs brtse

ba bskyed de/ sems can thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang thob par byed pa/ nad thams cad gso sbyong mdzad pa/ dpal thams cad dang ldan pa/ dus ma yin pa dang / bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa dang / dgra thams

cad dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / chom rkun dang / mi rgod dang / rgyal po'i gnod pa dang / seng ge dang / stag la sogs pa dang / rims dang / skran dang / mtshan bar rdol ba dang / sdig sbrul gyi gnod pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gang gis khro

bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos nyid mthong bas sems can thams cad kyis dbang phyug thams cad kyi go 'phang thob par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol bcom ldan 'das/ shAkya'i mgon po rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje byung ba che

ba'i bdag /snyan pa'i tshig gis bka' stsal pa/ /sa stengs kyi ni dkyil 'khor mchog /bshad par bya phyir bu khyod nyon/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba ni/ /khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/ /phan

pa'i sems kyis tshur la nyon/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /'di dag thams cad ma gsungs pa/ /ngan pas sems ni 'khrigs pa la/ /bu khyod kyis ni sbyin mi bya/ /re shig slob dpon rab tu bshad/ /bu khyod mnyam par gzhag

pas nyon/ /de ni kun du rab gnas 'gyur/ /gang mang cung zad bdag gis bshad/ /tshul khrims phun tshogs snying rjer ldan/ /bzod dang brtson ldan legs par gnas/ /gtsang zhing cho ga phun sum tshogs/ /bla ma yang ni smod mi byed/ /

bdag nyid ji bzhin gzhan phan blta/ /sbyin la dga' zhing ched du brtson/ /bden pa'i tshig dang yang dag ldan/ /gtong phod la dga' mnyes gshin pa/ /lus kun yon tan phun sum tshogs/ /sangs rgyas nyan thos rgyal sras rnams/ /

rtag tu mchod par 'gyur ba dang / /bla ma la gus nga rgyal med/ /'gro la gcig tu phan zhing dge/ blo gros zab mo yang dag ldan/ /dus dang dus min shes dang ldan/ /dbang po don gyi cha rig pa/ /rtag tu sems can phan par dga'/ /gsang

sngags mnyes par shin tu brtson/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ru rab tu bsngags/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po lha rnams dang / /sangs rgyas nyan thos chos rnams dang / /skyob pa byang chub sems dpa' yang / /cha shas rig nas rtag pa yang / /zab mo'i don ni rab

tu bstan/ /ser sna yang ni yod ma yin/ / khro ba gang yang brtse bar smra/ /bsdu ba bzhi yi ngang tshul shes/ /pha rol phyin pa drug gis brgyan/ /byang chub sems dpa'i go cha bgos/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i go 'phang gnas/ /nyan thos

rnams kyi ji bzhin bshad/ /bden pa bzhi ni sgom byed pa/ /sngags pas de bzhin 'dir gsungs pa/ /byang chub sems kyis bsgom pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis/ /'di ni yid kyis sgom byed pa/ /bsam pa'i ye shes thob

par byed/ /theg pa chen po las byung ba/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam bzhi dang / /pha rol phyin nyid drug tu 'dod/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i 'bras stsol ba/ /shes rab can de sgom par byed/ /ljang gu dkar dang ser ba dang / /mdor na nag por gyur kyang

rung / /ring dang thung yang mdangs bzang ba/ /phyag gis pus mor sleb pa nyid/ /rtag par rgyun du zhal ring zhing / /mgo bo mnyam par rnam par rgyas/ /smin mtshams ma chad shangs mtho ba/ /rkang pa'i long bu chung zad dmar/ /yon tan thams

cad yang dag brgyan/ /sdig pa'i rgya mtsho rnam par sbyong / /chos rnams thams cad mchod par bya/ /de nyid kyang ni ston par byed/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi cha shes pa/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs kyang ngo / /rjes gnang dang ni dbang bskur 'thob/ /

gang zhig yang dag ye shes 'gyur/ /bla ma la gus lha dang ni/ /sngags dang phyag rgya bsdus dang ldan/ /gsang sngags rgyal po'i gsang sngags shes/ /sems can mnyes shing brtse ba smra/ /bzlas dang sbyin bsreg de nyid shes/ /zhi dang rgyas

pa'i de nyid shes/ /sngon spyod dang ni dbang bya shes/ /sngags dang phyag rgya shin tu sbyor/ /bla ma yang dag bsten pa yang / /ston pa bzhin du sems par byed/ /'byung po thams cad mchod par byed/ /'jig rten pa yang de nyid

rig /sems can snyom med phun sum tshogs/ /spro ba dang ni bstan par 'gyur/ /gang gi dbang phyug shes rab sngags/ /thams cad dbang du byed pa yin/ /khro bo rnams ni rtag tu bzlas/ /lha mnyes pa la ched du

byed/ /tshul khrims dang ldan phun sum tshogs/ /sku dang gsung las yang dag byung / /brtul shugs kyis ni yang dag brgyan/ /rtag par thams cad skyong bar byed/ /de ltar yon tan mdor bsdus pa'i/ /mtshan nyid bdag

gis bstan pa yin/ / 'di rnams yang dag yongs shes pa/ /slob dpon du ni rab tu bsngags/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa'i cho ga ni/ /gzhan du na ni 'bras med bu/ /gsang sngags rang gis mi 'grub cing / /gzhan la bstan yang

'grub pa med/ /dkyil 'khor 'bras bu bcas pa min/ /sngags kyi sgrub thabs dag kyang med/ /bsrung bar bya ba kun kyang min/ /sbyin bsreg lha yang med pa ste/ /'di ni sgom pa med gyur pa'i/ /mtshan nyid 'di ni rnam par spangs/ /

de bas rnam pa thams cad kyi/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid bsngags pa yin/ /de bas gsang ba'i ye shes 'di/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung bar ni/ /gsungs pa ru ni shes par bya/ /gzhan du na ni 'bras med 'gyur/ /slob dpon dang

ni slob ma yis/ /rtag tu bag yod gyur pas kyang / /rtag par rgyun du bsrung bar bya/ /bdag nyid srog ni ji bzhin no/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang ni/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu dkon/ /de yang sa stengs gtso bo yis/ /

bshad pa yis ni shin tu dkon/ /de phyir rnam pa thams cad kyis/ /yon tan kun gyis yang dag brgyan/ /slob dpon gyis ni rtag pa ru/ /gsang sngags yi ge bcwa lnga bzlas/ /'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas gyur nas/ /sbyin

sreg kyang ni brtsam par bya/ /de ltar byas pa'i sngags shes pas/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bri bar bya/ /gdug pa med cing bgegs kyang med/ /gzhan yang 'byung tshogs la sogs med/ /mthu stobs kyis ni bgegs byed

pa/ /go 'phang 'bras bu yod ma yin/ /thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang 'thob/ /kun kyang bde bas yang dag brgyan/ /'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bral/ /the tsom med par 'gyur ba yin/ /gzhan du thams cad 'bras bu med/ /

bgegs kyis glags ni btsal nas su/ /sngags pa'i lus ni 'phrog par byed/ /cho ga'i 'bras bu bya ba med/ /de ltar byas na sngags pa bdag /dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya/ /sangs rgyas gcig shos go 'phang ni/ /

de ni thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dbu la sa gzhi yang dag bshad/ /mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyis nyon/ /dkyil 'khor mdzes mchog rmad du byung / /'di ni gang du bri ba ni/ /chu klung mtsho bran yang dag bshad/ /ri bo me tog 'bras

bus brgyan/ /skyed mos tshal du 'ang bshad pa ste/ /spu sdug rma byas rnam par brgyan/ /kun dga' ra ba khang bzangs dga'/ /phyugs lhas bres dang bzhi mdo dang / /gzhan yang phyi rol gang zhig tu/ /gtsug lag khang dang ri sul

dang / /khang pa brtsegs dang khang pa dang / /mtshan ma gcig pa ji bzhin du/ /chu klung kun dga' ra ba dang / /de yi khong gseb khyad par du'o/ /gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o/ /gang du yid la 'dod par bya/ /de la sogs pa'i gnas

rnams las/ /gang yang rung ba'i gnas bzung ste/ /lha ni spyan yang drang byas nas/ /yang dang yang du mchod par bya/ /yid nyid kyis ni gshegs su gsol/ /phyogs ni rab tu bcing bar bya/ /rang nyid go cha bgos nas gnas/ /

lus la gtsug tor yang dag brgyan/ /lag tu rdo rje thogs nas ni/ /lha ni yid kyis byon par bsam/ /de ltar bdag nyid gnas nas su/ /skye bo bsrung ba dgod par bya/ /de ru bdag nyid byin brlabs te/ /sa gzhi gzhan la shin tu

bsdad/ /pus mo gang tsam brkos nas ni/ /'bu srin rnam par bsal bar bya/ /skyon ni du ma dang bral ba/ /'bad pas slar yang rdung bar bya/ /ba yi rnam lngas byugs nas ni/ /me tog bdug pa dga' bar mchod/ /sa gzhi yi ni phyogs

kun du/ /gtor ma rab tu gtang bar bya/ /me tog sil ma gcal du dgram/ /dri dang bdug pa cho ga rim/ /sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin du bya/ /rnal 'byor dge bar 'dod pa yis/ /de ltar rab tu 'bad pa yis/ /gnas su nyi ma gcig tu

bya/ /legs par sbyangs par gyur pa la/ /lha ni spyan yang drang bar bya/ /khyad par du ni gtor ma dang / /dri dang me tog yang dag dbul/ /shes rab blo ldan mtshan ma bslang / /dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'byung / /gal te rmi lam bzang

mthong na/ /yid ni spro bar gyur pa yis/ /bdag dang gzhan ni bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal po bri bar bya/ /nang na shes rab can gyis spang / /'jigs dang rtsub pa'i mi dge ste/ /bdag dang gzhan la dngos grub

med/ /de la 'bras med 'bras bu 'byung / /dkyil 'khor dngos grub 'dod pa yi/ /shes rab can gyis de dbus bri/ /de ni khru brgyad de bzhin du/ /bcu drug dag gi grangs kyang yod/ /rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu ni/ /gtso bo lnga ni

rab tu gsungs/ /de ru cha gnyis su bgos nas/ /khru tshad gang ni phyi rol yin/ /cha gcig yang dag bshad pa ni/ /dbus cha yin par rab tu brtag /khru tshad gang du gnas pa der/ /dbus su sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/ /gnyis

pa rgyal ba'i sras po ste/ /mdo ru bsdus nas bstan pa yin/ /gnyis pa'i phyi rol gnas pa'i cha/ /der yang de bzhin rab tu brtag /khru tshad gang du mdor bsdus na/ /cha ni thams cad rab tu brtag /sgo bzhi rta babs dang bcas pa/ /bum
